If you enjoy outdoor markets or food, this is definitely worth the journey to explore and wander around. It is a somewhat narrow and winding alley that is full of all kinds of fresh meat/seafood and produce. It is definitely off the radar of most tourists, the only other ones on my boat up just turned back around and went south, without even setting foot in the town. I found this place entirely by accident but it was the highlight of my day.

Express Boat Stands at River Pier Misleading & a Ripoff. When you want to take the river boat ride, don't fall for the 150 Baht tickets at the Express Boat stand. Just get on a regular river boat that locals take, and an attendant will come around and collect only 14Baht from you, giving change even. Tourists all think they have to pay for a ticket before getting on and pay 10 times as much as they should. Many even get on the wrong boat and have to pay again when the attendant comes around. The 150 Baht tickets are for the tourist boats with blue flags only. It's the same ride down the river.

Chao Phraya Express Boat - No good. If you want to discover Bangkok by boat use a boat with yellow, orange or white flag. They stop more often and are cheaper. 14 Baht per trip and not 25 Baht as for the Express Boat. For a day pass of 150 Baht with the EXpress Boat ( blue flag) you can do 10 trips with the other boat which is not even slower and goes more frequent. Just watch out for the right coloured flag. Happy travelling

Great way to see the sights on the river.. At 150baht this is very good value. This is the tourist boat but if you use the public boat the cost will be even cheaper. The advantage of this boat is that you get a commentary along the route and you can get off and visit the major sights such as grand Palace Temple of Dawn, and the Great Reclining Buddha at Wat Pho..

Great way to get around in Bangkok. Very nice (and cheap) way to get to and from different sigths in Bangkok. We took the boat from Central Pier (you can get there by skytrain). The boat takes you to all the major sights like the Grand Palace, Wat Arun, Wat Pho and Chinatown.

Trip to Nanthaburi. I took the Chao Phrya express from Si Phrya pier, which is next to Royal Orchid Sheraton and got off at Nanthaburi the last stop on the ferry. I walked around the town, market and got fresh flower garland. The market was buzzing on Saturday morning.The fares were about a pound for return journey by ferry :) A Very cheap day out.I bought some cakes and loaves of bread for the disabled from the big bakery opposite the market.The ferry ride was nice and it stopped at few stops on the way.

Bangkok Leisure Trip. This was my first time using Enjoy Taxi services after reading such good reviews about them. Indeed Mr Notty & his team of drivers excel in their services and I would not hesitate to recommend them to other travelers.
Family Trip to Bangkok. Fast booking for my airport transfer and very reliable agent and driver. Highly recommended for family who is looking for airport transfer service.

Punctual and friendly. Notty was friendly and willing to answer all my queries. He was very accommodating at my (quite) last-minute request for a booking. He also updated me with the name of our driver the day before the scheduled trip!Arrival, though, was confusing as I couldn't find any sign with my name on it at Gate 3 (the designated meeting point). Had to call the lady driver several times but she was very friendly and patient and walked all the way in to find me. Along the way, she was welcoming and answered all our queries.The departure trip to the airport was a smooth one. The driver reached early and waited in the ground floor lobby for us. We came down 10mins earlier than our stipulated time and he was already there! Price-wise, I believe this is a great price for the quality of vehicles and the service of their drivers.Will definitely hire Enjoy Taxi again when I'm in BKK the next time!

Excellent day trip. Recently went on a day trip with this company to the Damnoen Saduak floating market and had to say it was smooth and faultless. Driver eas waiting for us in hotel lobby as planned and then brought his very clean and air conditioned vehicle round to the front of the hotel. It's a long way to the market from Bangkok but lots of info given on the way and asked us if we needed a rest break. Once at the market we were ushered onto a private boat to commence our tour, We were taken to a large temple to satrt and then a tour of the market. Both our boat driver and guide remained patient throughtout, which was a tall order as i'm such a fussy shopper and we stopped at any stalls we wanted. All in all a good day out made better by the guide and transfer.
Great ride on the local Taxi. We all enjoyed the ride on taxi, although most of the taxi driver say very high price, but need to negotiate with them to get a good bargain or they rip you off.

all very good and cheap on the meter. taxi's on the meter are the cheapest way to get around they are cheaper than tuk tuk's but make sure the taxi is on the meter if not then agree your price before you get in.Local taxi journeys should only cost between 100 to 150 Bhat.where as tuk tuk's can cost 150 bhat for a short journey but always agree your fee with the tuk tuk driver first and anything over 200 bhat for a short journey is way way too much maximum should be 150 so between 80- 150 bhat for a tuk tuk maybe a little longer journey would be 200 bhat max.Thanks all.Eddie.
Nice and fast and cheap. Needed taxi service to airport they were very accommodating with my luggage and helped me with it and I arrived on time
Great Service. The driver was punctual and reliable. A good value for money and nice cars. Easy booking and payment methods.

They where on time with good a car and reliable drivers. Absolut no hassle, just relax in back seat and enjoy the ride.. I would recommend enjoy to use them for your business travels. Drivers speak English. They know the way to find your destinations.
Taxi transfer. I recommend this taxi company to everybody, you get a great service at a good price.Easy to communicate with them and also available for day trips.
Good Choice!!!. Needed a taxi and got this company!! They were very accommodating and very, very cheap!!!!! I would recommend them to anyone traveling around Bangkok!!

Really Enjoy Taxi. Mr. Notty was very helpful, Friendly and polite. He was mixed with my 10 year old Son just like a friend. Kids of our group really enjoyed with him.
Pros-
Friendly staff
Safe driving
Clean Vehicles
Punctual timings
Reasonable prices
Prompt reply
Cons-
Nothing Noted.
Catch a taxi. Taxis are the best way around you can negotiate a price before getting in or ask for the meter to be on.most fares are around 100-200bht any more is a bit dear.

Excellent service. VG Customer Service, on time and reliable. Thanks to Mr. Thong and Ms. Thida. Surely, I would recommend Enjoy Taxi. Thanks to Mr Notty for 100% customer service provided. When I visit BKK will definitely contact you again. More Success!
Trip to woodland muangmai. The driver arrived punctually and drive safely and efficiently. The car was clean and comfortable. As is common in BKK the driver's English was limited but sufficient.

Easy access. You should get the taxi across the city but if you are tourist they try to give you a fixed fare due the heavy traffic conditions. however it will be unto you to manage this. Taxis are easy accessible from the hotel and they the best time to use them is not peak hours so you will be spending less.

Everything in order. Choose this company because of the good reviews & reasonable prices.
We were not disappointed. Communication and service was good and always punctual.
Excellent Service. Taxi service in Bangkok is very good. Taxi drivers are very friendly and helpful. Cost also affordable for us.

Excellent and friendly service. Notty and the team provided excellent, friendly and timely service. All confirmations made promptly. The driver was friendly and good. The level of service was one of the highest that I have had when booking a car transfer. Recommend this very highly.

On time and polite friendly airport transfer service.. With all of the options available for airport transfers, I must admit I was a little apprehensive when booking. Enjoy taxi service communicated confirmed bookings via email a couple of times, and our driver was quite easy to find in busy Bangkok airport. Drivers for both legs of our transfer were polite and on time. Great service.
Nice. The driver was very nice, also the car that made us feel comfortable during the trip thankyou so much
Responsive and on time. Engage Nitty and team for airport transfer yesterday. Overall was rather smooth with no hiccup. The email correspondence before the trip was prompt and clear. Very happy.

On time with good cars. You pay a bit extra for ordering a taxi but we preferred having the knowledge that the taxi would be a decent sized car with seat belts and a safe driver. Enjoy Taxi Bangkok was excellent. Driver was always on time and very helpful.

Excellent service. We used Enjoy taxi for a trip from Suvarnabumi to Ayuttaya and back to Din Muang. For a family of 4 the big car taxi (Toyota Innova) was an excellent choice. The car was very clean.
Thanks to mister Chatree for driving us safely and mr. Notty for easy communications.

Wonderful four days with Mr. Notty's team. We had a great experience with Mr.Notty and his team. We toured with Mr. Notty for one day and with Mr.Thit for 2 days and one more person from his team for 1 day tour of Ayutthaya. Mr. Notty and Mr. Thit had very good communication skills and were able to talk fluently in English, not the same for third driver. His rates were very reasonable and we had a great time.

Taxi Bangkok from Airport to Central Bangkok. Great Service - stressfree. Driver waited for us at airport although plane delayed by 1 hr. Great service and value for money. We were 4 passengers - 2 adults - 2 kids + 4 large suitcases.= 9ootbh. Will use this company again, truly recommend

Amazing Service!!!. We used their service for transfer from Bangkok airport to hotel and then from Bangkok to Pattaya and then from Pattaya to Bangkok. Every time the driver was present before time. Cars were clean and were as promised. Notty was prompt in his responses. Hassle free booking and drives. I would really use it next time too.

Driver... Used enjoy taxi several times. From BKK airport to kancha, from ayuthaya to Bangkok and back again to the airport. The prices were reasonable and less expensive than other drivers. Being short on time this was our only solution. The driver didn't speak english, but he was attentive to what we needed and drove cautiously. Very nice guy Mr. Chumphol ! Thanks :)

Last Alternative of transportation. I put taxi as last alternative transportation when I traveled in BKK. the service is fine and most of driver is polite and helpful. before taking a taxi, you know where you go and sometime need to put GPS on your smartphone is on for checking the traffic jam. prefer to get access into free way to speed up your travel with taxi. enjoy!!!!
still wanna go again. 😆. hope next trip. hoping next service . get good service in explained for other option place .thanks

Good service. Visiting Bangkok and Pattaya with my friends in mid-July, we used their service for three times including the airport transfer and the day trip. Their drivers were polite and drove safely. Their cars were in good condition and clean. Furthermore, their pricing was competitive. I will use their services again.

Excellent Service!. Perfect service, allways on time, perfect individuallity!
We have had pick up and delivery from/to airport and an amazing daytrip!
Thanks notty, it was beautiful!!

Great service!. Very happy with Enjoy tax Bangkok. Both drivers were early on pick up and they were both very nice, especially Mr Notty. Would highly recommend and i would definitely use again in the future.
Commendable transport service. Enjoytaxi is very efficient.  They're easy to talk. Drivers are punctual. We availed transfers for both our arrival and departure. Hassle free. Highly recommended!

Very recommended transport service!. I contacted Notty through whatsapp and he responded quickly not like other companies. We are family of 7 with lots of luggages so we need a big van to accommodate our mobility. We book 4 trips in total with him and every single journey was amazing. Notty was truly like a friend who recommended good places and good services. Since I am taking my parents so we need to adjust some destination and schedule when the prices are set based on destination, but with Notty those are not problems. He is really generous. We are extremely happy that when we want to adjust our trip he did not always come to "additional money" as solution. He is happy to help and always asking if we are doing great with the driver. Mr Swang our driver was great, he always smile and happy to joke with us as well. He is also accommodating. At the end of our trip (4 trips booked with Notty) we left something at a mall and need to take it before our flight, Notty was really good that he allow the driver to turn around and take me to the mall when the price we agreed was supposed to be only airport transfer. I am beyond happy and definitely recommend all of you to book with him. Nothing should be improved since everything was good with Notty and his company. Good job! Will book again from you.

Great Service Provided. This company can be contacted via website or WhatsApp. Notty, the person in-charge, was rather prompt with his reply.We booked this transfer from airport to hotel as we wanted to secure a transportation that can fit 2 adults and children comfortably and safely. We were afraid that we would not be able to get a spacious taxi if we were to take queue for one at the airport. Price quoted by Enjoy Taxi is reasonable and definitely competitive as compared to some other companies that I have contacted. Price is inclusive of any tolls or surcharges.Our flight was delayed and we were about 1 hrs to 1.5 hrs late. However, the driver waited patiently for us.Thank you!

Outstanding dedicated driver. Such a fantastic driver, on time, always confirming, always happy to assist.My team and I are filming for Tv in Bangkok and always have to change times which must be frustrating, however not wirh this Nottee.He works wirh you to make sure your trip goes well for you. He is always smartly dressed, smiling and has outstanding english and manners.I would not use anyone else.

Excellent Service. This was trip for my parents , Notty helped to me plan the places of attraction and was very flexible in the schedule . During the course of the trip they had organised it very well.

excellent Service. Fast response when making arrangement through email with Mr. Notty. Mr.Chatree is the friendly driver who pick us up from the airport . Mr.Chatree has been waiting for us at the gate more than an hour due to our flight delayed and high traffic during custom check, but he still greet us with his big smile when he saw us. we have save our time with enjoy taxi, definitely will use their service again for next visit. Thanks to enjoy taxi team.

Good Service. Notty is very responsive in email and gave good suggestion on the planning as I wanted to go to the train market, floating market and Amphawa. The price offered is a good one in terms of services provided and comparing with other companies. The driver, Chatree, came on time and very friendly. He gave me the bluetooth speaker so I played music the whole time during the long commute. He also provided us a router so we could get online everywhere. He also brought us to clean bathroom upon request and a good coffee place. After we finished hanging around the place, I just took a photo of where I was and he would come to us and bring us back to the car. I really appreciate the attitude of Chatree. :)

The Big Friendly Tour Guide. Mr. Big was friendly with both the students and the teachers. He was always ready and enthusiastic despite the heavy Bangkok traffic. The seats were large comfortable but with some concerns about the metal bar on the floor in the back seat. He let the students select music and the atmosphere was one of a rolling party. Both his Thai and English was excellent. He drove safely and efficiently. Thank you for leading us through the mean streets of Bangkok.

Great Tours from Bangkok. Our holiday in Bangkok went perfectly. EnjoyTaxiBangkok arranged excellent tours on different days. Thanks to Notty. The drivers too were great. We will always recommend this team to our friends.

Transfer Bangkok-Hua Hin: perfect service, 100% reliable: highly recommended!. We needed a transfer from airport BKK to Hua Hin (3h drive) and back for our family of 4 with a lot of luggage. As I have previously booked transfer services for other holiday destinations I have 3 major requirements:1. The car has to be big enough for 4 people and luggage (4 suitcases+4 onboard-trolleys). If you ever spend 3 hours in a car with your trolley on your lap you know what I am talking about…2. All seats need to have functional seat belts. Especially the middle seat in the back should have something to prevent that my little one flies through the windshield in case of an accident.3.The driver should know that he has to look on the street and NOT constantly on the mobile phone. I like Formula1 on TV but not live in a car on the other side of the world…4.I am always afraid that they might not show up or are late. Reliability on transportation is a wonderful thing if you have to catch a plane.Notty (he is the owner) and his company Enjoytaxi fulfilled all my requirements completely. From all of the taxi services that I contacted, they gave the second best offer and I chose them because he was committing to the type of car (Toyota Innova) while other taxi companies just told me we would get a „family car“.The email communication was precise and professional, our plane was 1 hour early (5.10am!!) and the very friendly driver was still on time as they were tracking the arrival.The driver did not speed, did not constantly pay attention to his mobile, drove save and not aggressive.The car was in a very good condition, clean, functional air conditioning, not an old model. I would have preferred a 3-point seat belt instead of the hip-only seat belt in the middle back seat but I was happy that all safety belts were there and working.Finally, one day before our trip home, we decided to keep the car for the entire last day and they were also very nice and gave a fair offer for the additional time we wanted.

Very Good Service. I was in Bangkok on vacation with friends and called Notty that morning to seeing if he was available for that day and he was. He sat with us and figured out what we could do and see he was great ! Beside the big sites, Notty directed us to places to buy suits, handbags and every other gift items we wanted. The next day he drove us to the floating market for what was a great experience. I hired him to drive me to the airport and was early with a cold bottle of water as well as willing to stop for coffee. I would hire Notty without question the next time and every time I am in Bangkok !
GOOD. Best Service from Mr Notty and Mr Noom, Will recommend friends or relatives who going to holiday at Bangkok

Neil Harper. Super friendly and on time. Great english and immaculate car. Nothing is a problem. Great local knowledge. Took us off the tourist trail for a far more realistic experience of the true Bangkok.

Safe, cost-effective and comfortable travel. We booked with Notty for three journeys. The first from the airport to BKK city centre, the second to Hua Hin and then from Hua Hin back to an airport hotel. Notty was friendly and very responsive in terms of email. He was also happy to agree a small discount for the number of trips taken, which was appreciated. The drivers arrived on time and spoke English. In terms of the journeys, they were comfortable, we got to our destinations on time and more importantly safe. When you get into a taxi, you never know who will be driving, but I can wholeheartedly recommend Enjoy Taxi and would definitely use them again.

Budget friendly, prompt service!! . Used Notty's service for 2 out of 4 days stay in Bangkok for private transport. Notty was easy to communicate, all via email and whatsapp. He sent his driver, Mr C (cannot spell!) who spoke English (approx 30%) and we booked a 7hr first day transport to wat pho and then to the river. Notty's rates are very budget friendly in comparison. Mr C picked us up in an Innova, had water in the car and Notty was able to rent two car seats (one booster) for us. Traveling with twin toddlers is hard enough and the ride was comfortable and safe. We also hired Mr C / Notty for transport to Safari world and purchased discounted tickets from Notty. There are cheaper rates online but I offered to pay more for less hassle with Notty. The ride to safari world was pleasant and Mr C took us into the safari park and made up time to see the tiger feeding. After the tiger feeding, we breezed through the rest of the park, all in less than 20min. It would have been better if we had taken our time driving through the safari park with a more concerted effort to slow down. Mr C did forget to give us our entrance tickets so we had to wait at the gate for him to come back. It was a hot and crowded day so that was a hiccup, however, I was able to take the kids to the bathroom so no morning time wasted. Overall it was a happy experience and Mr C was ready to pick us up and fly out of the parking lot. Note that this is only a transport service. No frills. The driver picks you and and drops you off where you want to go with approx destinations discussed ahead of time. They do not walk inside the market with you, eat with or translate. Mr C's van was clean, car seat installation and buckling had a learning curve, most of the time the driver understood us and you get what you pay for. I would highly recommend this car service for the price and service. Notty was flexible and very trustworthy.

The ONLY transportation for me in Bangkok. Enjoy Taxi Bangkok was more than a taxi service. Notty's vehicles were reliable, comfortable and convenient for my groups needs. Notty transported us for 4 days and he was ALWAYS prompt and professional!!! Notty's sightseeing/shopping/tour suggestions were on point and we ALL were beyond impressed with this company. This will be the ONLY company I use for transportation when I return to Bangkok!!! Thank you Notty & brother!!!!

The Best of The Best....Enjoyed..."Enjoy Taxi Bangkok" Services.. Notty and his brother provide van service for us (a group of 8) for several days/all day. We spent 5 days in Bangkok and Notty provided service 3 of the 5 days. The price was reasonable. Notty and his brother are very professional and knowledgeable of the city. He gets to know you and make suggestions of places and things that might interest you. We referred his services to other members of our group staying at other locations who had extended their stay in Bangkok. All in all Notty and his staff are trustworthy, timely, professional, patience and the vehicle was in excellent condition...highly recommend his services...I guarantee you won't be disappointed! Oh by the way he speaks English well.

Beyond Excellent Customer Service. I cannot begin to tell you what a pleasure it was to have Notty help us navigate our way through Bangkok. This young man needs to be cloned and shared around the world. Not only was he punctual each and every day we used him, he was patient and thoughtful with us when we sometimes couldn't get ourselves together. This being my 1st trip to Bangkok, everything was a bit overwhelming. Not having to worry about reliable transportation made my stay more enjoyable. The vans used to shuttle us around town were all air-conditioned and very well kempt. If you want a worry free get around in Bangkok, Notty and Enjoy Taxi Bangkok is all you'll need. Trust me you will not be disappointed.
exemplary service, Notty is superb..highly recommended. Notty was always punctual, well-presented, knowledgeable and his car was in excellent condition..he was very obliging and we never felt rushed

Trustworthy and good English speaking Driver. One thing you cannot get away in Bangkok is a taxi scam but that is NOT the case at all if you take Enjoy Taxi. The driver can speak good English, so you don't have to worry about being in a place you did not ask for. I use Enjoy Taxi every time when i visit Bangkok and never get disappointed.

Private car transfers Bangkok or travel to Hua Hin or Pattaya. I was happy to find excellent reviews for car services at Bangkok airport on Trip advisor but the actual EXPERIENCE of using ENJOY TAXI was even better than I could imagine! No more waiting in line in hot humid weather after a ten hour plane trip for a taxi, or haggling for a price with a non English speaking taxi driver or trying to explain where i am going! . Notty from Enjoy Taxi was friendly, polite, spoke excellent English with a beautiful clean comfortable air conditioned car with complamentry water!! Tomorrow i will use Enjoy Taxi to whisk me to Pattaya for my snorkling vacation.This is wonderful and well priced for me a solo woman traveler but they have large SUV's for families and groups of friends too.You can also hire a car and driver to sightsee in Bangkok and out of town trips! Don't suffer!! This is the way to go!!!
good service. nice car and driver，drive safely and slowly，make my baby comfortable and soon fell asleep，will book again for sure！

Pick up from home to the airport. First time to used taxi from this company. I'm a woman and I was travelling alone from home to the airport at 3.30am. Khun Notty was truly understand and arranged woman taxi driver to picked me up. Car was clean and woman taxi was kind and polite. I sent a map and told her how to come to my home earlier 1 day but she got lost and didn't contact me luckily I contacted her before our appointment 15 mins so she picked me up a bit late. Anyway, I really appreciated Khun Notty was very quick reply and very helpful. Recommend!

Airport Pick Up. Very smooth airport pick up. Very quick and clear communication in advance and it was very easy to find our driver at the Bangkok airport, who drove us safely to our hotel in Bangkok. It's cheaper to do a metered taxi - which is what I did returning to the airport - but especially with a late arrival, it is totally worth having the car and driver waiting for you and the payment sorted ahead of time.

Great trip. We had a Tour to the tempels of Ayutthaya. 1 hour driving from Bangkok to the tempels. A Nice clean car. Very polite driver with knowledge of the temples. No time limet and everything possible. The driver took us to a local noodle restaurant it was great! After he took us as a treat to a roti shop. After dropping us at our hotel we had a great day.Worth trying!!

Car service for peace of mind. This review is in 2 parts. Airport transfers: we used Enjoy Taxi for transfers 3 times using a big taxi/SUV since there are 4 of us with 3 big suitcases and 3 hand carry suitcases. At all times, the drivers knew basic English to communicate with us. Always friendly, respectful and importantly very prompt. One driver, Mr. Chompoon, offered us to use his cellphone when he overheard us talking about the slow internet (we use T-Mobile and we get free data coverage in Thailand but only 3G speed). Notty coordinated all the pick ups for me. I initially sent him an email to inquire. I gave him my cellphone and let him know I use What's App. He then contacted me via text and email. For my last transfer, I sent him a text the night before I needed the service and within minutes he confirmed it. 2 hours before the pick up, I asked if it was possible to move pick up 30 mins early, and again within minutes he replied and confirmed. For peace of mind that I'm not being overcharged, we asked concierge for prices for the transfer. We were quoted 3x for the use of the hotel service, then double Notty's rate for a private car company recommended by the hotel. Temple tour:Notty himself picked us up in a Camry (3 adults + 1 teen). He was dressed very professional (even in the heat) and speaks very good English. He recommended we do Grand Palace with Emerald Buddha and Wat Pho. Soon after our pick up, it started raining very hard. On the fly, he revised the plan. We went to Wat Pho first and told us to get a message while waiting for the sky to clear. Smart idea. We walked around on our own at our own pace. Then texted him when we were ready and he picked us up where we got dropped off. The next stop was at grand palace. We parked the car and he walked the palace and temples with us. He is not an official tour guide but he was still able to give us basic facts and answered our questions. He knew the grounds and having him there made the tour efficient for us which a made a big difference when walking in humid and sweltering heat. Notty offered to take us to Jim Thompson house on the way back. But the heat made us tired. We requested to be dropped off at the mall instead on they way to our hotel since my MIL just wanted to go back. Yes, I totally recommend this taxi service.
Luxury service. We traveling with Notty our driver was nice and politely his car luxury and comfortable. We delight to recomend this company.

DEFO RECOMMEND. We booked the service of Enjoy Taxi for the duration of our stay in Bangkok. Airport transfers and 2 day city sightseeing tour.throughout the booking process, Mr Notty was very prompt and accommodative. On arrival, our driver, Mr Kasem was waiting for us at the designated meeting point .... no waiting around looking for him !!!!!!!!!!!Our designated driver was with us throughout the duration of our stay in Bangkok. Mr Kasem, our driver, was friendly and also very flexible !!!!!!!!! evidently doing his best to ensure we were able to make the most of our time in Bangkok. Mr Notty too was in touch with us to ensure our satisfaction with the service !!! The vehicle provided was in good condition and very clean too :-)The no hassle service at a very reasonable price is defo a winner !!!!!!! i would recommend their services to anyone travelling to Bangkok for sure !!!!!!Thank you very Much Mr Notty and Mr Kasem .... we shall see you soon hopefully when i travel to Bangkok next :-)

Good communication, services and punctual. We used Enjoytaxi for our tours in Bangkok. Notty always replied emails promptly and our driver , Mr. Tao , is very friendly and always waited for us even in early morning. Recommended.

The Best in Bangkok. We took airport transfers and day trips from them....everything was perfect....taxi driver service....very nice and helpful. Don't think twice just go for them if you are traveling to Bangkok....nothing better. Just loved them!!

Bangkok visit. Just on our way back from Bangkok, had a fantastic time all helped by Notty our driver and tour guide. Right from collecting us when we landed from the UK to returning us to the airport on the day of departure. As this was our first visit we didn't know what to expect and Notty was recommended we felt very safe in a fabulous luxurous car that was very comfortable. He took us to all the sites and came with us his guidance was perfect too. He speaks English which is one of the difficult barriers in Bangkok and although a little bit more expensive we didn't get ripped of and he made sure we didn't get involved in any scams which you can easiy to be pulled in with. If anyone requires any further information or advise our trip was absolutely fantastic and we can't wait to return very sadly just waiting to depart to Heathrow.
Enjoyable tour!. Notty drove us to Ayuttaya and back in a very nice tour. Friendly and helpful guy, comfortable car, I can recommend him.

Incredible day in Bangkok. My brother and I had an incredible day in Bangkok thanks to Notty ( Enjoy Taxi Bangkok ) . we had only one full dat to spend in Bangkok and had to see as much as possible . morning started with a tour of the Kings Palace and then we went to Ayutthaya the ancient capitol of Thailand . We visited a few historical sites and headed back to Bangkok for a long tail boat ride ; our day ended at an upscale shopping mall with a fantastic Thai dinner ... Thank you for a great time !!!

Huahin Trip. I found this company on facebook and contact them by phone call. So the staff very kindly gave me the details and quote the fare from Bangkok to hotel in Huahin. We took the Van car for 8 person driver name Noom he was very nice and politely. Definitely I will use this company again and share to my friends.
Very professional.. Our driver Notty is very polite and patient, very helpful too! And quite a safe driver. Would definitely use his service again when I'm back here. Highly recommended!
Great Service. Thank you Enjoy Taxi for giving free upgrade car service to us!!! Price is reasonable, car is clean and comfortable and driver is very friendly.

Honest, helpful A+ ride. Knotty our driver was a great help in our stay in Bangkok, so great we used him all 4 days we were there..Very nice, new clean vehicle.He also had Wifi connection to make out travel more effective. Notty was a great help in suggesting attractions/shows, even calling ahead to book for us..A++ service

Not What Reprsented. I contacted this company because of the reviews. I was understanding that this would be a more comfortable upscale vehicle. A regular taxi from center city to the airport runs less than 400BHT without tolls of about 75THB add $35 THB if you are catching a taxi at the airport which is their drop fee. I was quoted 800THB including tolls. To our surprise when the car arrived it was a taxi not like a private company vehicle in the pictures. The driver was polite and the vehicle clean but I felt like I got ripped off because I could have gotten a taxi for the $400Thb. .

Peace of Mind with Great Service. If it's one thing I hate in Bangkok it would be Taxi Rip-off, but as I stated on my title it is all about "Peace of Mind"; I have been all over Thailand and even for a seasoned visitor like me, I still get scammed by taxi driver, and for this trip I am traveling with my folks so I opt to go for a transport service agency and after reading reviews I believe I have chosen the right one. If you have read all EnjoyTaxi Bangkok review they are all about "Prompt and Great Service", this is their motto as explained by Mr Trai who sent us to Ayutthaya from Bangkok, What I like about Trai was that he was very kind of him to call me in advance to inform the that he is stuck in traffic and that is already a plus for this company. As for the rest of the drivers Mr Sompop and Mr Kasemsuk who picked us up from the airport and back they were all on-time and waiting for us at the airport and lobby. Really kuidos to your patience and service. If it's one taxi to take in Bangkok this company will be it. And Kudos to Mr Notty who will reply your message / emails within the hour, so if you are in Bangkok and need a taxi services for tour or business trip do call to arrange in advance as they are always mostly fully booked.
Excellent support. Enjoy taxi and its driver Notty was very good, helpfull, trusted and knowledgable. His timely help made it easy our plan. I highly suggest.

Prompt reply, great service. I used their service in Dec 2015 for a day trip from Bangkok to Jim Thompson Farm in Pak Thong Chai. I booked their service through email and received prompt reply. The driver, Mr Kasemsuk arrived early on the day and he was very polite, spoke English well and drove safely. The Big taxi that we booked was also very clean and in good condition.

Excellent service!. Great service, i will recommend to anyone i know who comes to Bangkok, the driver was on time, drive carefully, car was clean and enough big for our luggage, safe and reasonable price!

Outstanding service, highly recommended. I emailed requesting car service from BKK to Ayutthaya and back on 24 hours notice, and received a response within 15-20 minutes. After a brief exchange of details, we were confirmed shortly thereafter. Communication was prompt and clear.Our driver, Trai, was waiting for us in the hotel lobby the following morning. He spoke very good english and was most gracious, and transportation was comfortable and easy. Trai was willing and able to deviate from the original plan such that we could fit in a visit to the Museum of Contemporary Art on our way back to BKK. This was a real "bonus" in our travel, we cant thank Trai and Enjoytaxi enough for the personal effort they make to deliver the best possible service.In our conversations with Trai, we learned that he was a former pro Muay Thai fighter who still trains other fighters. When he learned of our interest in the sport, he offered to take us to Channel 7 stadium for the Sunday afternoon events (there's no admission fee, so Trai didn't make any commission). We jumped at the chance to employ his services for another day and it proved to be the kind of "insider" experience about which many of us dream. Trai is impressively well-versed in all aspects of Muay Thai, and having him point out details about everything from the gamblers to the champion fighters to the general history was fascinating. Having been to Lumpinee Stadium (both old and new), we strongly encourage anyone interested in Muay Thai to seek out Trai through Enjoytaxi for transportation plus "guided tour" (for lack of a better term) of Channel 7 Stadium on a Sunday afternoon. If you can't book a trip with Trai, at least make a point of checking out the fights there by yourself. Not only is it free, but the competition is primo and the small "stadium" is packed and wonderfully intense. Thank you Trai, we will definitely see you again!

Excellent service. We had booked a van through 'Enjoy Taxi Bangkok' to pick us from Don Mueng Airport at 6 p.m, take us to Sriracha tiger zoo and drop us at our hotel in Pattaya. The driver was on time and was waiting for us. The journey throughout was very comfortable. In fact, the owner of the taxi called later in the evening to confirm that we reached safely and wanted feedback on the service rendered. I strongly recommend anyone coming to Bangkok to avail this taxi service.

Excellent service. Notty my driver was punctual. Speaks good English. Nice comfortable car with free wifi. Excellent to book him whn you have back to back meetings in various locations in and outside BKK city. 100% reliable. Will definitely use his services again!
Great service, trustworthy. I arranged a pick up for my daughter. She was arriving at 1am and I wanted to fe sure she would be fine. They were amazing and we're waiting at the airport.
Very Professional. Booked via e mail, Notty the owner gave us a great price for meeting one of his drivers at Bangkok airport to take us for a 3 hours Trip to the River Kwai

Grab a "Enjoy Taxi Bangkok" the only Superb Car Service!. Why not? Enjoy Taxi Bangkok is surely one of the great things in Thailand! We ride it going to the floating market, city tour and going to the airport. First of all, the car looks really clean and elegant like your on a VIP trip. Second, the ac is really good. There is also a complimentary of bottled water for each passenger and imagine a wifi too!Thank God. Plus we asked for our favorite music, its there! So cool! Lastly, but definitely not the least, the ride and driver. We had a very fine driving and convenient drop off and meet ups. It is also very important that the driver is very fluent in English, very friendly and very patient with us! (We had too many questions around the place, including personal questions about Notty and etc etc etc) hehe!! Alhamdulillah ❤️ I highly recommend this car service because the cost is definitely worth it! For me, its part of the things I cant miss in Thailand.

7Star car service. We used their service when I been to Bangkok. It's my first time to Bangkok and we very happy to use them. First we book the exclusive car pick up from airport to the hotel in the central city. Driver wait us and show my name at the airport. He drive safe and prompt service and we still use their service when we go back as well. Everything was perfect and we have a great time. We suggest all of you enjoy their service !!

Great Driver and Exclellent Service. We used Notty for Airport Transfers and Tours. He is a charming, caring and genuine person who gives excellent service at very reasonable (significantly less than private guide tour companies) prices. No hesitation to recommend Notty to anyone visiting Bangkok

Trust Notty to get you where you need to go. We just had the best first day in Thailand because of Enjoy Taxi Bangkok! Our driver, Notty, was a very experienced tour guide--he took us to Wat Pho and the Jim Thompson house--and gave us lots of information about other parts of the city. He was polite, kind, and knowlegdeable about a variety of things to do during the rest of our stay in Bangkok. With ETB, you can make arrangements to go where you'd like to go during your stay, but they will also have other helpful suggestions depending on your plans. We are very glad we worked with Enjoy Taxi Bangkok and Notty, and we definitely recommend you meet him too.

Best service in Bangkok. Absolutely the best service I've experienced.I would highly recommend to all travelers .Notty is very polite and friendly and always punctual . He makes you feel like you're touring with a friend.Using this service has made my stay in Bangkok very enjoyable !!! Pricing is also very reasonable and I feel very lucky to stumble upon his services.

Awesome Driver. Mr. Notty has many knowledge for the plan ... tour very smooth.....polite driver...first trip I went to Floating Market, very enjoy that. Second trip I went to Ayutthaya that was awesome too.I really enjoy with him, I suggest him to my friend, my friend was compliment him too. So make me very happy too.
Airport transfer. Very very good time fast and sefety the car verynice the driver very friendship.i hope sue him again
Nice Trip . I and family went to Huahin by Enjoy taxi Bangkok it very nice that good service and good communication. I recommend this company.

Enjoy and Safe trip. I highly recommend Enjoy Taxi Bangkok, thier services are excellent! Very clean car with free wi-fi and complimentary water. You will feel ease,safe and relax throughout the travel. The drivers know how to speak english and they will give you many useful tips during the tour. They are also friendly,kind and can be trusted. They are always on time and wait for you patiently. Choose Enjoy Taxi Bankok ans surely u will enjoy ur journey!

Wonderful trip. Great car with a wonderful trip to floating market. The car was so nice and clean, driver politely and drive safe, easy for booking and quickly confirmation by email.I always use their all the time when i want to go everywhere in Bangkok.

Fantastic service. We had an amazing day with Ayutthaya and the Enjoy Taxi Bangkok Limousine Service. Our day started with a private pick up at the hotel. Mr.Anuchat was delightful and his knowledge of the area was great! where we had a great tour and wayyyy too much amazing. Overall it was one of our favorite days in Ayutthaya and we have Anuchat to thank!!

Perfect tranfer !!!. I and my girlfriend use enjoy taxi service. This is my second time to use them everything was perfect . The car was clean and new . This time I rent Toyota Camry to Huahin and come back to Bangkok with the same driver. So I'll recommend this company to my family and everyone that I know.

Nice service!. I had booked enjoy taxi bangkok from airport to pattaya. I use them everytime I've been to Bangkok. Highly recommend this company to everyone. The car (Big taxi) always clean and driver speak english very well.

Nice and clean Camry , Good service driver. (Recommended). I and my family always choose Notty (Driver). Clean and nice Camry car. Service was wonderful like always. He gave us precisely information and his knowledge is very updated. If you need any information he will try to assist you any time. Even on my 3rd times trip ( urgent trip ) he couldn't pick me up but he offered his closed friend to pick me up instead. Although it was not Camry car ( white Vios) but service was very nice. The driver can speak both English and Chinese. He looks like 7D in Snow white. we are happy to use their service.

Terrific Transfers. Used Thai Happy Taxi for transportation three times while in Bangkok. Drivers were all pleasant, professional and on time. Airport meet & greet service was great. Note The drivers spoke limited English, but it did not affect the service. Was very satisfied & would use Thai Happy Taxi again...

Available at the airport for trips to anywhere in Bangkok,. The drive loaded and unload our luggage and took a direct route to our hotel. The fare was about what I expected. The driver's English was limited but enough to get the job done with a bit of help from Google translate.

Excellent service - no surprises. The process of reserving the taxi was seamless. Order from home via internet, the company is responsive, and there were no hidden costs. It was slightly more expensive but worth the cost for this well organized service
From Bangkok airport to the port. Hi, can someone help me whit some info? I want to know a price for transfer from airport to tha Leam Chabang port.

Professional and prompt. Used their services based on reviews by other TripAdvisor travelers. Booked twice for a van and once for a sedan. Though a little pricey compared to regular taxis but very professional and reliable. The cars were all in excellent condition and the drivers well-mannered and polite. Well worth it when you want reliable and dependable services.
Very good Taxi Services. Very good Taxi Services, very reliable and very cheap. Just make sure they use the Meter !! or it could be more expensive. All round very good.

Wonderful Service!. After 30 years of travelling to Thailand we finally found a really good taxi service. This was the first time we had used the services of Mr Happy and we are most certainly glad we did.The booking process was easy with prompt acknowledgement. The driver arrived bang on time and provided the very best service. He was probably the best driver we have ever had on a long journey as he took us from Bangkok city centre to Pattaya.We will definitely use this company again.

Impeccable as always. It is such a pleasure dealing with this company. Communication via email is always professional and prompt. Car driver service is of a high and safe standard. Cars are well maintained. Fantastic value for money.

Airport service . After 18 hours of flying time my partner and I were exhausted we arrived at Bangkok international airport took us an hour to get through customs. Could t find taxi at first made one quick phone call told them where we were standing and he magically appeared! Took us straight to our hotel with no hiccups.I would definitely use happy taxi again no doubt!

Best Friendly Affordable Service. i used them quite often, recently for my trip to Hua Hin, as i need a Return Trip but not as a standard in the online form, i emailed them and they were fast to response and very helpful.Prices are very competitive, i paid 4,200 THB for a Return trip to Hua Hin and back to BKK which is 3 to 4 hours away. Highly recommended !

perfect. booked thai happy taxi online . no adance payment done online , just booking , they were there on time waiting with a name placard , clean car and were dropped at my destination and payment made. would definetely recommend

Excellent. Pre-booked with these people for a couple of seperate journeys. The staff arrived before schedule they were polite and spoke good english, far better than using a taxi which can be quite slow. Also there are no additional fare's so whe price you are quoted is the price you pay.

Swiss precision Thai style. Used Thai Happy Taxi again. And they keep impressing me. Always on time, high end cars, kind drivers. You don't need to worry about anything - they pick you up in the airport and drop you of at your destination. A little pricy but Highly recommended.

Reliable and efficient. We've used Thai Happy Taxis a couple of times now, for transfers to and from Hua Hin and Pattaya. This is a fantastic company - bookings are dealt with promptly, including any queries. A deposit is required at the time of booking - we prefer to pay in full at that point, and this can also be accommodated.They'll text you with details of the driver collecting you from the airport, so it's very safe. The drivers are friendly and helpful, the cars extremely clean and comfortable. Pricing is competitive, and generally cheaper than your hotel or resort will quote you. I'd highly recommend them, and personally I wouldn't consider using any other service.

Comfortable and prompt taxi service. We booked with Happy Taxis twice - to travel between Bangkok and Pattaya. They showed up early each time, the car was comfortable with aircon (we booked the luxury option for 1500 baht each way) and the drivers were friendly and it was nice for once not to have our taxi drivers using a mobile phone when driving us on the freeway (other taxis we booked from the street had texting drivers, which makes me uncomfortable). The booking process was very easy and both times we were able to book taxis at short notice. The cost covered all road tolls too so we paid the driver when he showed up and he took care of the tolls from that.

reliable service. I used this company for pick up from airport and return trip. What I like is the easy booking through the internet and their reminders by e-mail and the reliable timing. They keep their quoted prices and you can book them also for tours.

Thai happy taxi. It takes some of the guesswork out of it!We used Thai happy taxi service whilst moving around Thailand via Bkk, around 6 times in all, reasonable rates, punctual and polite. That's it.

5 + star service. While in Bangkok I used their service twice. Once to go to Pattaya and then back. Last night again to get to airport. I can only say that this is fast, safe and very reliable service that I will use whenever in Thailand. From my experience they proved trustworthy as whatever I agreed with them, even remote pickup in Pattaya after 24 hours was respected in best possible manner, car was on pickup point 15 minutes earlier. Same for airport, not only that driver took as to airport but also get us right terminal for air company, went out to give us wheels, put our bags in to it ... really happy with their service and support. Highly recommended.

Good Service Airport Pickup. Arranged pickup ahead of time from Suvarnabhumi as we had late arrival and didn't want any hassles with trains or buses or taxi touts. Pickup driver was there waiting for us, helped with luggage and delivered us direct to the hotel with no hassles whatsoever.It costs a little more that just getting a cab - but it's always nice to arrive and see someone holding up that little sign with your name on it !

Booked various tours and taxi services. On my recent trip to Bangkok and Pattaya, I booked various tours and taxi services throughout my 20 days stay and this company was wonderful. I booked all tours prior to arriving in Thailand. Every time, I received a friendly and prompt driver. Reasonable priced.

Reliable taxi service. We booked a taxi transfer from Suvernabhumi to Hua Hin with a late night arrival. Booking process was easy and strength forward. The driver was there were the confirmation said he would be. Brand new luxury car, polite drive who drove us safely and quickly to the destination. Would definitely use Thai Happy Taxi again.
Good service. Used their service to go to Phuket. Driver was a polite and friendly man. The car was in good condition and clean. During the whole trip we felled secure.

Simple and reliable. Taking holiday overseas, travelling is major problem. Hiring transport by negotiation is a headache. Happy Thai Taxi could let you free from these. I booked my trip on line, vehicle and fares are all stated, clear and simple. No advance payment but pay directly to the driver upon arrival. I travelled from & to Bangkok / Pattaya, vehicles are clean & neat, driving is safe, nothing can pick on. If you start your trip at Bangkok airport, please book your driver to wait at a patricular exit as there are 3 exits at the airport.
Excellent. Excellent service. We reccomend the taxi service and the driver (we booked and used from Pattaya to Bangkok).
Fast and efficient. Very reliable taxi service. Every ride i had went smoothly. The driver is polite, knows enough english to have a conversation with and is always aware of the customers needs.

Reliable and well priced!. We booked a transfer from our apartment in Udom Suk to Don Mueang airport with Thai Happy Taxi.Although an avid user of Uber cars I always like the feeling of security knowing that an airport transfer is book and locked in. Uber can be a bit hit and miss in Bangkok.Yes it's not the cheapest way to get to or from the airport but they are efficient, reliable and courteous and offer peace of mind that gets you to the airport on time and stress free.
Smooth transfer from Airport to downtown. Car was on time, clean, Nothing to worry/complain about. Price correct. No surprises. Fine for a transfer, reliable.

Reliable service. We booked after reading the reviews and the service was excellent. We booked a return service to/from Hua Hin from the airport in Bangkok. The person was waiting there as stated in their emails. Communication was quick and very good. The price was also reasonable and they stop midway at a nice petrol station/rest stop.
Reliable Taxi. Didn't use happy taxi for a tour, but they drove 4 of us from Bangkok to Hua Hin. Punctual pick up, safe car and driver.

Very Reliable. We used Thai Happy Taxi for airport / hotel transfers and found them very reliable. Upon arrival in Bangkok, our driver was ready and waiting for us. We had a safe and pleasant journey to our hotel and were assisted with our luggage. When moving on, we had an early morning flight and a scheduled pick-up for 03:15 in the morning. Our driver was early and already waiting in the lobby when we arrived for check out at 03:00.Thank you Thai Happy Taxi for your excellent reliable service.

Great Service For Transfers. We needed to book a transfer from out Hotel in Bangkok to our Airbnb in Pattaya.We booked online and they took great care to get all the information for our transfer to Pattaya and then our return to our last Airbnb back in Bangkok three days later.They always kept in communication with us and were always on time.The price was great, the drivers were excellent and knowledgeable The van we hired was new and was in perfect working order.I would use then again my next visit to ThailandWe did not use them for the tours but for the transfer, however the details that showed would make me use them for tours my next trip..

Outstanding. We were in Bangkok for two weeks and we used them 8 or 9 times - including trips to and from the airport; to and from Pattaya; and a couple of customer tour packages. They were always there on time or early. The drivers were very good - you felt safe. And the cars were clean and in good condition - usually a Toyota Camry or something similar.

So safe so trust on time. I called them through my cell phone and arrange for atransfare from hua hin to bangkok round trip they took my name and room number and the time that i want to pick up So thay came on time the car was comfortable the driver has alovely smile that made our trip so peasfull And the payment is cash after you reach your ditenation

Back to back good experiences. Had these folks pick us up at the Marriott in Bangkok and deliver us to Ayutthaya and then two days later pick us up and take us to the airport. Nice non descript Toyota camry....was a bit worried it they would show with some funky writings all over the car.Punctual and professional in both directions
Pefect airport transport fro & To !. Thnx people from Thai Happy Taxi for a perfect puick up at the airport and a perfect drop off! The van was perfectly on time both times!
Great service!. We booked a private car touring around Bangkok for a day. Good tour. Driver drove carefully and safely. He took us to major sites of the city and could also speak some English.
Great service.. Great service and cheaper than hotel cabs.Went to floating market and price was much cheaper than anywhere else-and driver very knowledgeable !!

Perfect taxi service from BKK airport to Pranburi and return. Some months before my stay in Pranburi I found Happy Taxi via Google and sent an email for an offer. The offer received has been very ok, so I made a reservation for a ride from the new BKK airport to the Sheraton Hotel in Pranburi and return.Some days before the arrival I have received an email reminder with details about meeting point at the airport, mobile nbr. in case of delay and so on. The rides from an to the airport a week later have worked perfect: friendly and helpful (luggage) driver, clean and comfortable cars, punctuality and good price have convinced me to book this company again and to recommend it to anyone.
excellent transportation. this firm has an axcellent service- reliabel en very correct. not expensive en excellent carseverything to book by internet

Floating Market & Bridge Over the River Kwai Trip. Our driver met us at our hotel (after a little confusion as to where we were meeting). Lovely, comfortable car to take us to the floating market (which was great and an absolute "must do" even if it is for the tourists (don't let that put you off)! Driver was extremely quiet (but we hadn't booked a tour guide so this was fine).He waiting for us and we didn't feel at all rushed (which was the reason we booked a private tour in the first place). He took us to the Death Museum and on to a Chungkai Cemetary at our request so that we could visit a family POW grave.Very accommodating, polite and quiet.An enjoyable day and professional service from Thai Happy Taxi's. Thank you

Good Service.. All transfer arrangement went well. The driver (Mr pong) was on time. He even whatsapp me a day before arrival where to meet and his mobile number. Well done. I will use your service should i return to bkk and will recommend to all my friends.

Clean and Profesional. I have used Thai Happy Taxis a few times to go from the airport to Pattaya. The cars have always being either new or near new and the drivers have always been friendly and professional. Highly recommended

Efficient service Bangkok to Pattaya. We booked Thai Happy Taxi Tours to drive our family of four from Bangkok to Pattaya. We contacted them via email and they replied straight away. We organised price and pick up time via email ( 1600 baht) The driver was at our hotel before the agreed time. The car was very clean and comfortable ( Toyota Innova) with enough space for two teenage boys and one mother across the back seat. There is plenty of luggage space in the boot. Our trip took approximately 1 and 3/4 hours. The driver was efficient and safe. Highly recommended.

Return trip Bangkok Pattaya. Excellent services if only drivers we pay for taking the responsibility to drive us as a family would consider to drive safer than when they do on their own carrying what we are not bags of potatoes...driving fast makes the sitting in the back particularly jumpy and changing lanes not the safest acceptable.Otherwise punctual good quality vehicles, with a premium compared to other drivers services, to be keptat its lowest please. Thanks we will recommend the company to others.

Van-tastic!. We used Thai happy taxis for transfers between Bangkok and Hua Hin. Pick up was prompt and the vans were really luxurious with much needed aircon! The drivers were very polite and even stopped half way through the journey, to allow for a break. Journey time was 3-4 hours and considering what we paid, it was excellent value for money. Very impressed overall. Would definitely use them again.

Definitely Legitimate. We had some unique taxi experiences in Bangkok(I think we were kidnapped by a Tuk Tuk)When looking for the best way to daytrip to Autthaya this place got good reviews on Tripadvisor but they did not reflect how great an experience Thai Happy Taxi provided us. The web site is super easy to book on and they got back with a quote right away. Pick on time with a very nice car with rockin AC. We just wanted to see a few temples out of the dozens there and had done a little research. The driver accommodated our request, however, was very familiar with the most visited wats if you did not know which ones to see. We did not want to get stuck on a 6-8 hour tour with the obligatory candy making demonstration and pressure sale($100pp) or hassle getting back and forth from the train station. We were picked up at 7:30, walked 3 ancient and 1 newer what, and we're back at our hotel by noon-exactly what we wanted. $125 taxi with 20% tip plus a couple $1.50pp admission fees.

Worth the money. They were very easy to contact and promptly replies to emails and request. Used their airport-hotel-airport transport service and there were no problems. The drivers were on time and respectful. Will definitely use their service again if I go back to Bangkok.

great sevice. we used thai happy taxi for Bangkok an was very happy with the sevice thanks so much stress free easy to find at the airport an was at resort on time to get us back to the airport for our next flight

Great Service. I booked Happy Taxi for a round trip transfer from BKK to Pratunam after reading the reviews on TripAdvisor and it was a great decision. We were a party of 9 and the van that picked us up was clean, spacious and punctual. Our driver spoke English well and was attentive and polite. Will definitely use them again.

Holiday in Bangkok. We had booked taxi for our transfer from Bangkok to Hua Hin. Were 12 passengers with loads of luggage. They had sent us an Innova and a 9 seater traveller. Very comfy cars. Had great drivers too.Will definitely get in touch with them on the next visit.

ROTARY FAMILY TRIP RI DIST>3262. This was 5 nights & 6 days tour package by 30 numbers of Rotary family to Bangkok and Pattaya.It was most thrilling and enjoyable by visiting several tourist places along with a friedship exchange meet with the Rotary clubs of Thailand,R.I.DISTRICT 3340..Visited Art in Paradise Gallery followed by world famouse Alcazar Show. on the 1st day evening &Sriracha Tiger zoo in the morning.On the 2nd day enjoyed Coral Island & Water Sports.On the 3rd day visited Gems Gallery ,Golden Buddha Temple and city tour of Bangkok.On 4th day visited Safari World and Dolphin Show.On the last and 5th day enjoyed gala Cruise Dinner which is most enjoyable & unforgettable.At last fly back home with sweet memories.

Prompt replies and good service. I found out Thai Happy Taxi from Google and went through the reviews. I decided to get in touch with them after seeing the good ratings and reviews by other users. I managed to get prompt replies for every email I sent to them. We booked the transport to do sightseeing in Cha-Am and shopping at Amphawa Floating Market. The driver did not hesitate to wait for us even we spent almost 2 hours at the floating market. However, the driver did not talk to us along the journey (maybe he is not good in English) and just smile when we talked to him. Overall, the driver has done a good job in driving us to the places of interest and providing a comfortable transfer service to Bangkok.

They do as They Say They Will. I used this company to take me from the airport to Pattaya and then from Pattaya to Bangkok. They pricked up on time and the vehicles were clean and in good condition. For sure I would use them again.

Airport transfer via back roads- not so happy taxi trip. Driver there on arrival. About a 10-15 minute walk up to car park. Driver took us a different route to usual, completely avoided highway and we ended up going through a dodgy area or two . We've been to bkk about 15 times but I think the driver didn't Realise that.i suspect he avoided the tolls to save some money. Emailed company to complain no reply. 800 baht- a taxi meter will be about 450 and will give you the same service,

Great service. Used happy taxi a few times good company drivers very friendlyTop cars When I got picked up on 25 May 2016 to go to Bangkok airportFrom pattaya ,After I got dropped off I noticed I had dropped my MasterCard in the taxiI emailed company just before my flight to ukWhen I got to uk I had a email waiting saying they found my card and destroyed itAs I had asked them how honest very trusting thank you driver MR NOOMAlphonsus wells

Excellent service...strongly recommended. We are a family of 5 with 2 senior citizens and a 4 year old.I was a bit nervous about using a taxi service since this was our first visit to bangkok. I decided on Thai happy taxi after reading reviews on trip advisor.Booking online is easy and quick. They are professional with follow ups and confirmation mails. You need to pay some amount as an advance and the rest in cash post the trip.We booked max van. As mentioned in their mail their team member was waiting at the assigned spot with my name on a placard. We were made to wait for about 5 to 7 minutes and presto the van was there.The vehicle was clean, air con worked well, driver drove well. Though communication with the driver was a problem it didn't affect us as he knew where to go and how much money to take.I strongly recommend Thai happy for the airport pick ups and drops.

Airport Puck-ups. Myself and my wife use this service every time we visit Bangkok. There are prompt (always waiting with a sign board), courteous and friendly. Their prices are reasonable and they are easy to contact at short notice via their website. They come highly recommend. Chris (Melbourne)

Brilliant. After lots of research we chose to use happy taxi for 3 trips whilst in Thailand, the communication was excellent and prices good, all our drivers were wonderful , early for pick up and very friendly, highly recommended

Efficient. We have utilised this service on many occasions from Suvarnabhumi Airport to our hotels in Bangkok. Communicating via email has been professional and efficient. Cars clean and drivers are excellent. Highly recommended when travelling in Bangkok.

Great service. I always book with Thai Happy Taxi whenever I travel to Bangkok. They respond fast, punctual for the pick up both at airport and hotel. Their vehicles used are new and clean and comfortable! Drivers are friendly too. Highly recommended!

very efficient. I would express my public satisfaction in relation to the services provided by the company Happy taxi from Bangkok. They were extremely serious and they answered to all our requests incredibly fast.
Fast and efficient. The taxi service was exactly where it said it would be. Straight out of Bangkok airport and on my way to the hotel. Booking was also easy and the fare is certainly very reasonable

Very Efficient. Booked 2 airport transfers online from and to BKK. I was contacted promptly by email to confirm my online booking and the price. Both times the driver arrived promptly and was fairly easy to find at the airport.I'm sure I could have found a regular taxi and convinced them to turn on the meter and take toll roads for cheaper than what I paid with Happy Taxi but it wouldn't have been worth the hassle at all.I'd use them again.

Bangkok to Hua Hin Taxi. Was extremely please with service provided. Excellent Drivers, that I found to be prompt and reliable. Their Office had no problem in making change to my pick up time in Hua Hin. Highly recommended and would definitely use again.

Reliable & Affordable - but can further be improved. We booked Thai Happy Taxi for our Airport to Pattaya transfer two weeks ago. Even though the booking was made last minute with less than 12hrs to go, our reservation was confirmed within minutes. Being our first time to book them, the 300bht down payment was a reasonable gamble. We chose a Camry and scheduled a pick up 2hrs after our arrival expecting that we may opt to have lunch before the long drive. However, since we were still full, I took a chance and emailed them using the Airport wifi requesting for an earlier pickup. Response was again swift, we haven't even gone thru immigration! We were informed that the driver was already waiting outside. Perfect! For our trip back, we again booked online the day before and we received the confirmation instantly. But this time no down payment was required since it was a repeat booking. What a nice policy! Overall, booking and coordinating with them was flawless!Now for the actual trip. The car was acceptable, clean but obviously overworked. The ride was smooth and thankfully we arrived safely both ways. We are not sure if the driver understood English as he did not speak to us and just nodded. For our overall experience, it would have been perfect if not for the following:- Safety Issue - both drivers kept on answering calls while on the highway- Drivers were in plain clothing and are not uniformed. I'm not looking for a fancy uniform here, just a simple t-shirt with the company's name and logo would have sufficed. It would have been more professional looking. Having any Tom, Dick or Harry carry a card with your name on it in a crowded terminal is not all comforting to see.Will I book with them again. Sure!

Amazing Thailand. Hi I am Dina,I am going to Thai for conference Model Unites Nation, we are was used service rental car from Thai Happy Taxi for going to anywhere in Bangkok and outside of BKK is was very good experience we was had. Thai Happy Taxi give us a good price and very good and nice driver is Mr. Kan if I am not wrong with his name . He also pretty good with English and very good driver.Thank you so much Thai Happy Taxi and Mr. Kan.See again on the future.. I would be happy used your taxi service again.Cheers,Dina.

Reliable and Reasonably Priced. Having been to Thailand a number of times before, I had always just negotiated with taxis or touts as needed to make overland journeys. This time due to scheduling issues I decided to try booking online in advance and chose Thai Happy Taxi based on reviews and price. I was not disappointed and subsequently used them twice more during the trip. I will use them again and recommend them for service (both online and the drivers) to others.

Might be Happy Taxi, but not happy customer. This is the 2nd time we have used this service. 18 months ago booked to pick up from Suvarnabhumi Airport Bangkok to Pattaya, driver not there when we landed, had to ring and wait 1 hour for driver arrival. This time all good from Bangkok to Pattaya, Pattaya to Bangkok Hotel Furama Silom, good car good driver but has wrong hotel, when we arrive at hotel tell him not the right hotel, stuck in traffic for another 30 mins while he finds right hotel. Then booked to pick up at hotel and take to Suvarnabhumi Airport for flight home. Picked up early thank God, driver cannot speak English MPV vehicle very average condition, onto motorway and passing signs Don Mueang International. My wife tries communicating with him and he just waves hand and says international Ok. after passing another sign I say 'NO Don Mueang',Suvarnabhumi. Car stops on motorway, phone call by driver, then the trek starts, back to Bangkok to other side onto the correct motorway and to Suvarnabhumi. Bloody hell, not impressed lost 40 minutes, surely our clear booking instructions to Thai Happy Taxis can be given to the pick up drivers, So not happy and would not use them a 3rd time

Prompt Service. We just used Thai Happy Taxi to go from Bangkok to Pattaya and then on our return trip back to Bangkok. On both occasions driver was early and helpful. Booking was made easy by email and every time we emailed them we always had a reply within 5-10 minutes. They confirmed booking by email a few days before pick up and we just paid driver on the day.Thank you Thai Happy Taxi for your great service :-)

Wouderful thai experience. Arranging my private tour with Thai happy Taxi was definitely the best choice!! I was even amazed with their kind and prompt correspondence when I booked my tour. I'm sure that no one can go wrong with Thai Happy Taxi. Sid was our driver and I really enjoyed talking with him. I would request him to be our driver again when I have a chance to visit Thailand again.

Jo is a star!. Booking with Thai Happy Taxi was brilliant. Excellent communications and correspondence from start to finish. Jo was our driver today. We booked a taxi for today to Ayutthaya. Jo arrived promptly as booked, the vehicle was amazing and comfortable and Jo was fantastic throughout the day. Honestly, it was Jo who made our day that extra bit special. He took me, my wife and our two boys to all the best locations. He was very polite, friendly, informative and helpful. My two boys (Charlie aged 6 and Ollie aged 2) really liked being with him. He helped with the boys, for example helping up steps and holding the little one's hands to keep him safe. Again, Jo made the day even more fantastic and he is a credit to the company. We would recommend Jo and Thai Happy Taxi to anyone. Many many thanks

A taxi that is On time and reliable .. We booked with Thai happy taxi from Bangkok to Pataya and then another later in the week from Pataya to airport at the end of our holiday.Iwas dubious at first as wanted a reliable company but previous reviews convinced me to book online, (normally I would book at a higher cost direct with the hotel). I was really impressed with the service received beginning to end, you did not have to pay in advance and had regular emails confirming if still required and that driver (name) will pick you up. The drivers at both locations turned up 15 mins prior, although they spoke little English they confirmed my name and location driving to and we're professional throughout. I emailed the head office a couple of times and always had a quick response. The taxi's were clean and tidy and got me to my destination in one piece. I would definitely use this company again in the future.
Always on time.. We always use Happy Taxi when we're in Thailand.Good rates, good communication, clean cars, and professional staff.

Dangerous driving. I recently tried happy for a ride from bkk to pattaya. The driver seemed to literally have some odd addiction to looking at his mobile. It was quite unbelievable to see. When it wasn't in his hand and texting or calling he would sit it down next to the seat and he would glance at it constantly in intervals of about 2 seconds picking it up every 30 seconds at least. Mostly chatting on the app LINE (he wasn't using gps) all while travelling 120 or 130km an hour to pattaya. They were also the most expensive at 1400 when compared to pattaya taxi or cherry taxi. I thought the higher price and happy name might mean better service. It didn't. The car was nice but when you die because the driver isn't looking at the road I don't think a nice car will matter.

Three separate bookings. Booking via email was very easy and all three drivers were on time. We travelled Bangkok to Hua Hin, back to Bangkok riverside and then back to airport.Happy with the service and the price we paid.

excellent company,best drivers. had booked VIP van at this company Bangkok to Pattaya.driver arrived very on time,very helpful,kind man and responsible driver.we liked everything so much!!! of course after such an awsome experience we booked same company 2 more times.and second driver was very nice,very responsible driver.we hired same VIP van for 6 hours Pattaya to Bangkok and driver stopped at every point of interest we were asking.he even drove our golf car at Ancient City tour because we just wanted to sit and relax:-))VIP vans itselve were very spacious,new,clean and aircon was working perfect.would trust this company all the time in the future as had 3 bookings and all of them went perfect!!!they even had child car seat for my 23 kg son and the price for child car seat hire was very small,about 8 euros per ride.

Great experience and we will definitely book again!. I found the page through the internet. The good reviews on TA made me curious and I contacted the team via email. We booked a trip from Bangkok to Hua Hin. Details have been managed via email. On pick up day the driver was very punctual, we were driven in a clean and tiday car just as we booked and arrived without any difficulties to Hua Hin. The driver was excellent and we can fully recommend the page and it's service. Everything went as agreed and no bargaining about upcharges or anything similar. We will surely come back!

Great service. We used Happy Taxi to drive us to and from Bangkok to Hua Hin. We booked from the UK because of the online reviews. Drivers for both journeys were on time (early in both cases) had good air conditioned cars, cold water and stopped if you needed a break. Fantastic company and would certainly use again if in Thailand

Quite expensive but if you plan properly then it's worth it. We have 4 people in our group so it's just right for a taxi to take us from Bangkok to Amphawa Floating Market, to Hua Hin with a return trip. Total cost for the entire (2 way) journey 5000baht. Yes it's quite expensive but it's an MPV that can comfortably carry 4 people with luggage and you don't have to rush or carry your luggage to a bus terminal, they come directly to your hotel to pick you up. It's such a relaxing journey. Our first driver is Mr. Phi (I hope I spelled your name correctly) who are very friendly and always smiling and joking. We stopped mid way to look at the floating market for around 2 hours and continued on to Hua Hin and he waited patiently in the parking area for us. We arrived smoothly to Hua Hin and felt refreshing and not a bit tired at all. Our second driver when we went back to Bangkok (didn't ask his name) is very quiet, maybe he doesn't speak English well enough but nevermind, we were quite tired and slept throughout the journey anyway.All in all, it's worth the money for these kind of trips if you don't like taking public transportation.

Great Service! Good Job :-) . I read the reviews first then decided to book at Thai Happy Taxi. At first, I had a hard time to booked thru their website, so I send them an email, asking for help. 1 day after, I received a reply from Benja. He apologized for the late reply and he informed me that their website is down at the moment. So then I ask his help to booked for me our pick up from Bangkok Airport-Hotel.He replied fast and also patient to answer all my questions. That's truly a sign of a good service. He quoted me some prices and ask me If I would like to pick some of their tour package.So I ended up booking a private transport from Bangkok city to Kanchanaburi Province. This tour includes Floating market, Tiger temple and Bridge. But I choose not to have a tour guide. We just want a private vehicle. And this was enough for me and for my bf. I also want to give a good comments to our Driver, Mr. Jo, he is on time and very kind to us all throughout our journey. So I do recommend to all of you who wants to have privacy and good service.
