Take the Thai Happy Taxi. And definitely you'll not regret it. Kind StaffsGreat ServiceClean & Private transportationGOOD JOB THAI HAPPY TAXI!!!!

Great custom day trip. We wanted to take a day trip from Bangkok to Pattaya (sanctuary of truth) and Erawan museum and ancient city. It was a full day from 7am to 7pm. I emailed several other services but they were the first to reply and had the best quote. I was reassured that my crazy schedule would work and also got a cost breakdown. Our driver Mr Jo was very punctual, courteous, safe and also made sure to walk us to each ticket booth we needed. The plan worked out perfectly. Given how much we got to see in our limited time in Bangkok we felt it was really worth the convenience, speed, price and the peace of mind.
Good taxi service. Knowledgable guide (and an immaculate car) and driver. Without these we wouldn't have visited many of the sites we did. Well organised and recommended.

Realiable. I had an overall good experience with Thai Happy Taxi. We were two girls travelling from Bangkok airport to Hua Hin at 12am midnight, so we wanted to be super safe and looked for an established company for taxi service. Thai Happy was very good with keeping records and they responded to my emails very efficiently, and even sent us the contact details of the driver prior to meeting him. Their pricing is very competitive too, though they do charge a 300B early morning fee for odd-hour trips like ours. The driver picked us up at arrival on time and took us to the car right away. The car was one grade higher than what we requested and it was very clean. The driver was very friendly throughout the trip and at no point did we feel unsafe (we were two girls travelling alone). I had a bad cough and the driver even offered me his small bottle of essential oil and told me it would make me feel better (and it did). I really appreciated the kindness. However, one thing that I have to pick on is when we were within 30 mins to Hua Hin (it was approaching 3am in the morning at that point), the driver told us that he was very very tired which got us worried. All along I assumed that he was a night-shift driver who wouldn't be fatigued during late hours.When we got off, there was a disagreement between us and the driver on the amount we owed but the driver didn't persist and accepted our lesser amount. When I was able to check my email I realized I had paid the wrong amount, so I emailed the staff right away. They were very courteous and said it was okay for me to pay the difference on the return trip. We had a different driver on our return trip, who arrived at our hotel earlier than our pick up time. Again the car was a mini van (not what we requested) but it was more comfortable. He was a fast driver but it did not make us feel unsafe. We got back to Bangkok airport at around 3 hours on a Sunday afternoon. Overall we thought it was a very reliable and pleasant experience although I would suggest the company to deploy actual night-shift drivers for late night trips to ensure the saftey of your customers.

The service provided was AWESOME. I took a group of 19 people, we did the Ancient City / Crocodile Farm on Friday, the Essential Temples on Saturday and the Bridge over the River Kwai with the Tiger Temple plus Elephant Camp. The guide Mr Sam was beyond Fabulous and the drivers were true to the slogan that Thailand is the Land of Smiles. Everyone in the group had a GREAT time. I strongly recommend Thai Happy Taxi for all your touring needs. The other bonus is the pricing can't be beat and you pay for what attractions you wish to partake.

Courteous and reliable. We used Thai Happy Taxi for 3 trips from Bangkok. All three drivers were courteous, punctual, friendly and professional and their vehicles were well presented. Our trip to Ayutthaya with Mr Jo was especially good, with a well planned itinerary which met our needs perfectly.

So easy and convenient. I had a first booked our trip with another company, but they ended up being really difficult to work with . So last minute, I booked our family's road trip to Hua Hin from Bangkok with Thai Happy Taxi. ! It was so easy, they got back to my email quickly, confirmed the time, address and provided the driver's #. The driver was on time, very nice and efficient. We booked our trip back to Bangkok and to the airport the middle of the night and had the same amazing service. Thank you!

Brilliant service. Booked happy taxi for three trips and received excellent service each time. Very quick to reply to e-mails and drivers alwiiays on time and very courteous. Good prices compared to other companies, no hidden extras.

Nothing to much trouble . We booked Thai Happy Taxi for two separate journey's first from the airport to our fist hotel we were a little late, but the driver waited for us he was very nice and helpful. The second was from Bangkok to Kho Chang the driver was ready and waiting for us was very comfortable and friendly . When we booked the response was very quick and all other was confirmed you also get a reminder nearer the time and the day before you leave that you are asked to confirm back excellent service would definitely recommend and use this service again many thanks to all the staff at Thia Happy Taxi

Great experience for airport transport. I used them for roundtrip airport transportation. I emailed them based on TA reviews. They responded quickly (based on a 12 hour time difference). I set up a pick up / drop off from BKK to the city. They emailed me each time a day before to confirm again.Cost was Thai B 2,000 for both ways. I paid a 300 Baht downpayment via Paypal, then I paid 1000 Baht directly to the driver for airport to hotel route, and the remaining 700 Baht to the driver for the Hotel - BKK return route. (I had some Baht already, but there are ATM machines at BKK, and I'm told the currency exchange rates versus ATMs are pretty good in Thailand as well given the extra charges they add to ATMs)While this is more than a taxi, it was nice to have it all set up, have them meet me at the airport and have a very nice car to ride in.Cars were clean, newer, comfortable, had water. Drivers were great. Very happy with Happy Taxi.

Great service!. I booked Thai Happy Taxi Tours about 2 days before my arrival. Their response time was very fast. They were able to accommodate me and my friends. Their driver, Mr. Sid, was punctual and helpful, even though he didn't talk much. But overall, great service!

Excellent service!. I used Happy Taxi for my transfers from Bangkok to Pattaya and back on 2nd and 15th Feb this year. Both drivers were early and very nice people..the cars were air conditioned and the drivers offered water and tissues to wipe away sweat caused by the very hot conditions!..this service was second to none, especially for the amazing price and I would highly recommend using them. I also recommended them to another person in the hotel I was staying in who also used them and also said the service was fantastic..10/10 superb.

Great service!. Booking was easy, prices very reasonable, the vehicles in good condition and the driver very friendly. The only snag was that the taxi was not at the gate where we were told he would meet us and we had to battle quite a bit to find our driver. Otherwise really good service.

Never Again !. Booked this company to take me to a remote location 5 hours afield of bangkok and upon arrival they were there ready and waiting with a pleasant smile much the same as all the other companies I have used in Thailand. The car was good and the driver was professional and we arrived at our destination safe and on time. Then it came to the bill - we had agreed a rate of 4200 baht each way and I had paid a deposit of 1000 baht so why was the driver requesting 5700 baht. The driver assured me that this was due to the long drive back to collect us and that we would only have to pay the balance of 1700 baht on our return journey 3 days later. OK - all appears well..... then the following day I need to travel back to BKK due to an emergency and I spoke with Thai happy taxi who advised they could not get the taxi to return until the agreed date which I totally understood and arranged alternate transport. Then it came to the over payment I made - no refund, no part refund which I almost understand (but don't agree with) so I asked that the credit be taken to another taxi which I needed the following week ....point blank no! Were they even going to turn up for the return - my hotel did not seem to think so!

On time and decent cars.. We arrived in BKK having travelled on standby so we hadn't booked up anything to get to Hua Hin. We phoned Thai Happy Taxi and the driver was with us within 20 minutes. The car was comfortable and clean which was great as the journey is about 3 hours. The rates were much better than at the Limo counter at the airport. On the way back I booked with them online and again they were on time and the car was comfortable. The only time I didn't use them was from the Bangkok city centre hotel out to the aiport where they were more expensive than a standard taxi and as the journey wasn't that far we went with a regular taxi. Overall though highly recommended.

Excellent service. Used this company February 2016 to book at 24 hours notice. Got quote instantly, paid deposit by Paypal and the rest was easy. Picked up on time, great vehicle, pleasant driver. What more do you need?

A very good service!. I am very pleased with Thai Happy Taxi service when i'm visiting bangkok last month. The driver arrived on time & very friendly to me as a solo driver. I'm absolutely goin' to use thai happy service whenever i'm goin to bangkok again. Such a lovely memory :) Thank u!

Very Good Service. Aside from our pickup being over 45 minutes late and a little difficulty in convincing them that we had a reservation, everything else went smoothly with Thai Happy Taxi.The car was very clean, in good condition. The driver spoke extremely limited English so no need for a conversation.We were whisked to our hotel in good order.Online pricing is okay. I think you can do better booking transportation at the airport when you arrive.

Very Professional and On time Service...Congrats Team. We booked 3 trips from Thai Happy Taxi from Bangkok Airport to Pattaya Hotel Grand Bella Resort, from our hotel Grand Bella resort to our next Hotel Amara Bangkok Hotel and from Amara Bangkok Hotel to Bangkok Airport. Amazingly on time service and Professional behavior from all drivers. I will recommend all my friends who will visit Bangkok to take service from your company. Keep up the good work and Congrats to all the team of Thai Happy Taxi Service.With regards,Sunil Thapa.

Very reliable book with confidence. I enquired about price via email and had a response within hours. I booked three separate taxi pick ups for our group of 4 plus our luggage. We went from suvarnabhumi airport to Don Meang airport for 12,000VND on arrival. After 17 days we were then picked up from Don Meang airport and taken to our hotel for 700VND. The next day we were picked up from the hotel and dropped off at suvarnabhumi airport for 11000VND.Each journey was on time with the driver at the airports showing our name on a board at the gate number emailed to me in advance. Each taxi was clean and roomy with leather interiors and plenty of luggage space.Our first taxi driver was fabulous getting us to the second airport in time for a connecting flight through awful traffic after our first flight was delayed with just 10 minutes to spare.Thoroughly recommend for peace of mind.

Miles better than an organized tour!. We used happy Taxi tours for a Kanchanaburi day tour, including Hellfire pass, Riwer Kwai and a waterfall. They were very helpful and took our constant modifications with a smile (we asked the pickup date to be modified twice, first gave the wrong address, etc). The car was in good condition, the driver was helpful, always asking what we would like, when to have lunch, etc. He just spoke English enough to communicate these things, but tried hard. He drove safely, adjusted air conditioning a hundred times to fit our party of four's different needs :)It was great service, thank you very much!

Outstanding service! . Thai Happy Taxi picked us up very early to take us from Bangkok to Kanchanaburi. When we got to the lobby at 4AM, the driver (Mr Jon) was already waiting for us in a very nice Toyota SUV. He got us to the bus stop with plenty of time to spare (1 1/2 hours early) before our bus took us to Elephant World. (Bangkok can have bad traffic so they wanted to get us there on time). The best part, Mr Jon sat and waited the entire 1 1/2 hours until he saw us loaded in the van. We felt bad, but he wanted to make sure we got exactly where we needed to be. When we returned to the bus station later that evening (around 4pm, which was 30 min earlier than expected) Mr Jon was already waiting for us to bring us back to Bangkok. The service with Thai Happy Taxi is superb! I would definitely use them again and again!

Recommended!. We booked a return trip from BKK airport, to Sheraton Hua Hin, and they met as agreed, good price and nice drivers. The first driver was maybe not the best English speaker, but that was quite alright as we were very tired from the trip to Thailand, and needed the quiet time to the resort. The return driver was a more happy chatty guy, and as the trip was at 3am, there was almost no traffic and the trip went by very quickly. The price was good, and they were both on time, so look no further- book airport transfer with Thai Happy Taxi =)

Great service!. I used Thai Happy Taxi for airport pick-ups and a day trip to Pattaya. The prices are very good and the service was great. The drivers were always on time, actually 10 minutes before time and got were skillful drivers. The cars were all new and clean. I had to e-mail most of my information, and usually got a prompt reply. I will be using this company on future trips to Bangkok.

Saved the Day. Had booked a ride online rather than use the free airport transfer bus because of a tight schedule, really good job we did, flight into Bangkok was delayed, but taxi still waiting with name board, only had 1.5 hrs to get between airports, mammoth task in Bangkok rush hour, no need to worry though, driver was excellent, how he got through some of the gaps was quite magical, can't praise enough.

Nice ride to Hua Hin. There are several ways to get from Bangkok to Hua Hin - train, bus, minibus, taxi. I had been traveling for almost two days from the U.S. and had a lot of luggage, so negotiating the Bangkok streets with all that after so long traveling in order to get the cheapest rate was not an option. This taxi service is not cheap but they pick you up in a new sedan and get you there in a hurry, with drop off wherever you ask. Driver spoke some English. They were also able to make last minute changes per my requests.

Happy taxi tours. Happy guest.. I used their service to and fro Bangkok - Hua Hin. On my arrival in Bangkok, We were quite disappointed because we had waited for the driver about 30minutes. Driver was late however he apologised and was very polite. The car is comfortable, and air condition works well. Another driver fetched us in Hua Hin the next day back to Bangkok. Mr Nung was early, indeed very early. He came with a very nice and posh car. He is definitely friendly and we enjoyed our journey with him. He even stopped somewhere for us to visit the toilet and for us to get some food.Overall, I would recommend and would definitely use Thai Happy Taxi again.

Reliable and secure taxi in BKK. My family and I are used to request his service every time we have to go to or come back from the airport to our flat in Bkk with our 18 months daughter. Indeed, he is one of the only one taxi having a proper baby chair and driving safely (with a honest pricing ;-). I strongly recommend his service if you want to avoid any risk of delay and miscommunication (as he speaks fluent English, Swedish and soon Japanese).

Easy to book. booked our taxi from bangkok to pattaya and return .We were kept well informed at all times by text and email .Our drivers turned up nice and early ,so we were on our way well ahead of schedule , both trips were smooth in nice clean cars with smiling drivers ,they only did a little English but not a problem and all journeys passed quite quickly .

Really good service. . Used happy taxi twice. Once was initial pick up from airport to Hua Hin and second time from Hua Hin to Kanchanaburi. Really reliable, good drivers, polite, made stops for toilets etc. slightly more than other Companies but the service was worth it. Would definitely use them again.

Poor service . Taxi driver showed up 45 mins late, and it was very difficult to get information. Luckily we were travelling between cities and not going to the airport. Furthermore their prices are higher compared to other similar services.

Professional and Thorough. Used them for 2 pickups and drop offs. You will pay much more than hailing a taxi- but you also won't have to worry about accommodating a large group- we had 10. Middle of the night pick ups were confirmed and on time.

round-trip reservation between Bangkok and Hua Hin. Some days ago of this year, I made a round-trip reservation between Bangkok and Hua Hin, with the payment contract of 3300Baht (including deposit) for forward trip and 2000Baht for backward trip.The drivers all arrived on time and were a bit kind.However, they all can not speak English and the car for backward trip was awfully bad, I think more than 10 years old, in contrast to new car for forward trip.So I suggest the prospective users not to book the round trip at a time.

Great service, good prices!. I used Thai Happy Taxi several times during my stay in Thailand, and each time it was a very good experience. The staff is very helpful and answer emails right away. Yo can book far in advance and short notice.

Punctual and good service. Travelled with Thai Happy Taxis from Bangkok to Hua Hin and return with no problems. Slightly late for pick up on return journey but this was due to traffic out of Bangkok and we were kept informed so no problem. Good, safe drivers and very clean and comfortable cars. Will definitely use next time we visit.

Excellent service. Booked three different trips with Happy Taxis (airport transfers and Bangkok to Hua Hin). very efficient and accommodating. even were happy to do side trip to markets on way to Hua Hin .. highly reommended

Great service. we used this taxi service while in Bangkok and found them to be very honest and reliable. They picked us up from the airport after waiting for over an hour delay with a smile and took us to our hotel no questions asked whenever we rang them they were pleasant and arrived on time every time.

Comfortable and affordable. I stumbled across Thai Happy Taxi Tours having done a google search. It was easy to book and I travelled from Bangkok to Pattaya and then from Pattaya to Bangkok airport through them which was cheaper than other companies with courteous drivers that turned up on time. It was cheaper than arranging transfer through the hotel.Only gripe was that our second journey from Pattaya to Bangkok airport was a bit sweaty as they didn't have the air conditioning high enough.

Excellent BKK Transfer and Day Trip to Pattaya. We used Thai Happy tours for our airport transfers and day trip from Bangkok to Pattaya. All the drivers arrived early and were very professional and courteous. Each driver arrived in a newer model car which was clean and comfortable with working air con. We emailed our desired itinerary for Pattaya prior to the trip and we were quoted a reasonable price. The driver had our itinerary prior to the day trip and he knew exactly how to get us to each attraction and we were returned to our hotel in Bangkok on the scheduled return time. We really enjoyed the day and did not have to worry about the drive or how to get around. Thai Happy tours really exceeded our expectations with excellent service and fair prices.

Reliable service. Driver were great and arrive early for all the three transfer. Bangkok to pattaya,and round trip to airport. My family have 4 people and we rent a MPV, it is comfortable and able to put all our luggage.I will recommend it to my friends.

Excellent service. I used thai happy taxi for round trip from bkk to huahin and I was very satisfied with the service. The staff replied to email enquiries in minutes and the drivers was polite and helpful. Will definitely use their service again.

Reliable and professional. My first trip to Thailand. Had to get from the airport at Bangkok to my hotel in Hua Hin which is approximately 2 to 3 hour drive. I booked Happy Taxi on line from England and agreed their quote (very reasonable at 2200BAHT). They communicated with me via email and I confirmed my flight details, arrival time, destination address. They emailed me to advise which arrival gate to go to (there are quite a few ). As soon as I approached the gate, I saw my name clearly displayed on a board held by my driver. Very polite and courteous, took my luggage, modern clean car with aircon and tinted back windows (stops the glare in the back) and off we went. Straight to my hotel in Hua Hin. Perfect, absolutely hassle free. I booked Happy Taxi for my return trip and the driver arrived 30 minutes early in a brand new 4x4. For anyone travelling to Thailand and not sure of how best to arrange onward road travel, Happy Taxi are all you need. Period !

Trustable and excellent service every time. We have used Thai Happy taxi several times now since we moved to Bangkok in July and we are a very pleased customer.We got Thai Happy taxi recommended from a colleague of us who highly recommended the company.What we appreciate very much with this company and their services, is that they keep a high level of communication with you by mail and mobile. The information flow is great and it minimize the risk for misunderstandings. You always get fast reply on your emails. They always brief you by email about key information in good time ahead. The drivers are always on time, often 30 minutes before, so you never have to wait or be worried if they come.The cars are nice clean and in good shape.The drivers are very polite and take stops when needed and you not have to 'small talk' during the travel if you don't want. The price level is absolutely fine. You can for sure always fine someone who offers a better price, but the price is not the only parameter for a successful travel. We find that Thai Happy taxi deliver a trustable and excellent service for reasonable prices.There are no hidden costs for e.g. high way fees. The agreed price is all inclusive.We can highly recommend this company for your next travel. We will for sure book at them next time we need a long distance drive.

Excellent reliable car service. I chose this company because of its reviews and was still impressed. We booked a return journey from Bangkok to Hua Hin around Christmas on line using the web form on their web site. They responded quickly with email confirmation. In fact all emails were responded to within minutes in good English which gave me confidence. I supplied my room numbers by email but in any case drivers arrived smartly dressed at the hotel lobbies with my name on their phones. They didn't seem to speak much English but that was fine. They knew where they were going and the cars were clean and good quality.It took two hours each way from Le Meridien Bangkok to the Sheraton Hua Hin. Smooth ride both times.The company did seem slightly more expensive than the cheapest online companies (B2600 and B2300 each way - explained because it was around Christmas) but I would be happy to use again because of the reliable and quality experience.

Good, reliable,safe and clean. Arranged the one day private taxi for family of four to Hellfire pass and Thai-Burma railway exclusion. Driver turned up on time and was accommodating in stopping as requested for food and toilet stops. Service was efficient, safe and clean. Given our group size it was far more cost effective to hire the taxi than to join a tour with limited opportunities to amend as we go. It was a long day trip but mad e more enjoyable by the service.

Friendly, reliable and safe.. We used Thai Happy Taxi to take us from from Bangkok down to Hua Hin. We arranged this before we left on vacation. They were great! A friendly driver picked us up at our hotel, on time and drove us to our next hotel. They stopped half way for food and a bathroom break. The van we rode in was very comfortable. Five days later the Happy taxi driver showed up and drove us back to Bangkok. It was a great relief to have such a friendly, reliable service when we were so far from home. You can tell that they do this kind of service alot, and are very professional. Thank You Thai Happy Taxi!!!

Excellent Service!!. I have booked Thai Happy Taxi pick-up from airport to hotels in Bangkok as well as from hotel in Bangkok to Pattaya - excellent service, clean vehicles, friendly staff and professional service. Highly recommended!

Great Guided Tour. Very easy to arraign by e-mail, in English. Everything was as promised. Driver was excellent as was the English speaking tour guide that Happy Taxi added. Communication back and forth gave me great comfort that all would be as expected. All in all a great day in a beautiful city at a VERY reasonable cost. First Class company

Wonderful and Efficient Drivers, not Expensive. Upon arriving in Bangkok we always have a Happy Taxi driver waiting for us.Thai Happy Taxi is more than tours but simple transportation between the airport and central Bangkok....plus travel outside Bangkok to popular destinations.For several people with luggage, it is possible to request a larger van with plenty of room. Air-conditioning is set at a comfortable level, the drivers speak English and bottled water is available. We have asked for a taxi at 3:30am and the driver is always there waiting. Never a delay. We always choose Thai Happy Taxi. Period.

Good reliable service. I have used this company several times - no complaints always on time, a fair agreed price, nice cars and safe drivers - all these things in Thailand are rare to say the least.Don't take the risk with local taxis for longer trips spend a few more $ and book a safer ride.

Fantastic service! good value.. I was looking for a taxi to take my elderly parents from Bangkok airport to Cha am return and I found the Thai Happy Taxi company on Google.The booking was made via email and my request was answered quickly giving pick up details and prices - with the arrangement being that you paid the driver each way.Both pick up's went very smoothly and we received an email in advance of the return leg re-confirming the details and giving the drivers name.I would definitely recommend them.

Airport transfer (1 way). Straightforward transaction. Driver was quiet but polite, only downside is we have to walk all the way to the carpark opposite the airport, a first time encounter for us coz usually we just have to wait at the waiting point.

Do not hesitate. We booked a River Kwai tour and Mr Joe our driver was excellent. Why get up so early in the morning when you can be picked up at your hotel by your own personal driver and do the tour you want to do. Communication with the company was first class and Mr Joe arrived at our hotel 10 minutes before the due time. Could not fault them in any way and would definitely recommend them. The cost of a private tour is only marginally more than organised tours and far more enjoyable.
Airport Transfers. We used these twice while in Bangkok just for airport transfers. Always there on time and very prompt would highly recommend!

Very reliable and good cars. We used them in multiple occasions between Bangkok and Hua Hin and also from the airport to Bangkok City and they worked perfectly. In time, nice cars, good service and I think right value for the money. Would recommend if you need a longer ride especially.

great service. Saw there add on trip advisor so thought id give them a go , all was arranged over the net for time ,pick up , gate exit , thought all was good , wrong , got to the Bangkok , easy , got to immigration OMG the line was out of the barricades going down to duty free , must have been close to 1000 people , we had arranged to get picked at 4 pm , we had not even made it to the barricades by 4 pm , lucky we used the free internet as we waited and emailed the company saying we where stuck , the reply was instant and we kept in contact with the company through out our wait so there driver knew we where still coming .after getting out at 5:15 pm our bags had already been taken of the arrival belt and the next planes baggage was on there , we headed to our meeting point and our drive was waiting for us , we then started our trip , we where grateful for the help we received with Happy taxi , that we booked our return to Bangkok with them , clean car , on time , and they did the speed limit , thanks guys will use you next time we head over

easy to use. We used Thai Happy Taxi's for our transfer from the airport to our hotel and back. Booking is a breeze online with confirmation emails very quick. The taxi's turned up on time and were clean and tidy.

Prompt, competitive, efficient & timely airport service. We used their service to travel from BKK hotel to BKK airport. Booked a family van for 8 poeple. Smooth booking experience, competitive pricing, efficient and timely service. Hassle-free experience. Will use again.

Prompt and efficient service. We used this service for return Bangkok to Hua Hin. Very efficient booking, communications and punctual for pick ups. The return journey to Bangkok airport was in very heavy traffic and I really thought we would miss our flight. The driver, realising our anxiety, pulled out all the stops and managed to get us to the airport with just minutes to spare....well done and I will defiantly use you next time!

No Problems. The booking process was fast and responsive. The ride from BKK Airport to Pattaya was a total 1100 baht. I was skeptical at first but I decided to give them a try because of all the positive reviews on TripAdvisor.com.I had to pay 300 baht as a down payment from Paypal. I booked a very late-night 3:00AM because of the late arrival of my flight. The driver was there on time and was courteous and professional. I paid the driver the remaining 800 baht in cash when we arrived at out destination. I will use them again.Keep it going Thai Happy Taxi... your reputation is good with me!

On Time and Friendly. We booked a Thai Happy Taxi "on line" to transport us to and from Bangkok Airport to Hua Hin. On arrival our driver was at the prearranged gate to meet and greet. He helped with our luggage to his Clean Air Conditioned vehicle for our journey. On our return journey the driver was timely being "ten minutes early" arriving us at the Airport in plenty of time for our flights. Both drivers where friendly and accommodating.We certainly would use Thai Happy Taxi's again.

Perfect choice if you need to go out of Bangkok. I ordered van to go from Bangkok to Hua hin. 15 min before the leaving, nice new van was waiting for us. Fully equipped incl. child seats. The driver was polite and helpful.

Very professional,efficent service. Booked Bangkok hotel to Pattaya and Return to bangkok.
The email communication with Thai Happy taxi was quick , very clear and precise.
The car reached the respective hotels well on time and drivers were friendly and drove very safely.
will recommend

Works like clockwork. Used them from airport to Bangkok hotel, from there to Hua Hin, back again to Bangkok and from there to the airport. Always on time, cars in very good condition and skillful drivers. On the last evening we had booked the taxi to the airport at 22.00, but decided in the last minute to change that to 21.00 only a few hours before our pickup. We had our hotel call them to change to 21.00, and there where no complaints. Driver came to the hotel 10 minutes to 21.00 with a smile on his face. Fantastic service. It is maybe a little more expensive than a normal taxi but so worth the money. I can highly recommend them.

Well Done. Waiting at Airport when we landed quickly found the driver due to exact pickup point, quickly taken to carpark for departure for 3.5hr journey to Hua Hin.Stopped for toilet break after 1hr and quickly on way again. Used them for return to Bangkok 12 days later, pick up was 9.30am. Was there at 9am Sid was our return driver having driven down from Bangkok to arrive for us.Stopped on the way back for toilet break again and then the the Elephant Museaum as previously arranged for visit, then to Hotel in Bangkok asked if there was anywhere else we wanted to see.Very good value for money

on time and comfortable. we used their taxi service while on our recent trip to bangkok and hua hin. throught, in bangkok , hua hin they were there to pick us on time, drop on time, offer clean and comfortable cars, fine drivers.

Best car service in Thailand!. We took the car from Bangkok to Hua hin, picked up at my apartment no problems, the driver was early and helpful. The trip was 30 minutes shorter than expected and we had the option to play our own music in the car from the aux cable. At our destination I left my sunglasses in the car, the driver came back to the hotel and dropped them with reception and the staff called me from the office to ensure I received them. Transport can be very difficult and time consuming in Thailand and this was the easiest quickest trip yet, most definitely recommend.
First trip to Thailand but won't be the last - I am currently looking to book again!. Happy Taxi's are the best, great cars. drivers are nice and helpful, would recommend to anyone going to Bangkok

Very good cars to offer. We hired this service to go to Pattaya from Bangkok. Booked from internet and then called the office. It was readily answered and they literally tried to answer all queries in reasonably good English. The chauffeur came prompt at the appointed hour and it was a Toyota Camry. It seemed to be a quite new car with pillows for the traveller. Very cozy and comfortable seats. They also gave packaged drinking water for us. The journey was very smooth and we just slept in the way while the chauffeur reached us to our destination. A big thank you!

Fabulous taxi and great service!. We rented the taxi for two days and had an absolutely fantastic car! For 6 people there is a lot of space and a luxurious design inside.Mr. Kan was a very friendly and competent driver who brought us to the floating market, train market and Chatuchak market on the first, to Ayutthaya on the second day! Strongest recommendation for private taxis in Bangkok!
Good taxi service. Supportive service, good cars, nice drivers. One of the driver even can speak quite good English and very friendly.

Very proffessional. Booked a taxi from Suvarnabhumi airport to Pattaya and back.
The drivers were punctual and the taxi fare is reasonable.
Mr. Koy is a very nice guy but unfortunately we can't get him to send us back to the airport.
Would definitely recommend this to friends.

Another wonderful trip. Another great trip with The Happy Taxi from Ko Samet. We live in Tailand and have used them lots of times. I deal with them by email, their replies are prompt and in excellent English. We had a problem the other day due to the floods/bad weather but they showed a lot of understanding. their booking/customer service is fantastic. You feel they do care about offering a good service. We had great drivers every time, we always felt really safe with them. Take the Happy Taxi and you can forget about disorganisation and fears of scams.

Great trip to Hua Hin with Happy Taxi. Excellent experience with Thai Happy Taxi for my day trip to Hua Hin from Bangkok. Reasonable price, the driver is punctual, and we are really happy with the service.

He took me to a Klong Boat site that was half the price of the regular boats. This is one of the best values for tourists who want to go to a specific attraction and the drivers can create a custom tour that fills all your needs and is reliable and very inexpensive. To get this service contact the conserge at your hotel they will make sure you get the real thing. Be careful as many bandit cabs try to offer this service. not the same as the original. great value and very knowlegable drivers who will also take you to many great off the beaten track sites and eateries that are excellent

Great company!!. If you're like me and a bit of a nervous Nelly, have no fear. I booked with them and received a confirmation within an hour. They picked us up at the airport at the time we stated and took us on a very safe trip to our hotel in Hua Hin. We also asked to be picked up in Hua Hin and be dropped off at our hotel in Bangkok. The price was fair and the drivers were very safe. I would definitely recommend getting the next size up vehicle for a more comfortable ride. There was just two of us but we booked the SUV which was very comfortable and held all of our luggage. I will definitely use their service again.
Excellent. Excellent website Amazing service in the airport The car and the driver was very very good.You can trust them 100% that they will arrive anywhere , anytime.

Excellent reliable transport.. We booked via the internet and had a confirmation within the hour. We had to make a down payment with credit card but that was alright. Our driver was there 15 minutes before the agreed time and he drove very well in a clean and well maintained car. To be recommended.

hua hin. we had a taxi meet us from the airport when we arrived from siem reap / the car was nice and clean and new /the driver was good but didnt speak english . on our return the driver turned up with his wife and dropped her off at the town . the car wasnt as good as the first and the driver forgot my request to stop at a atm . think i will pick a local taxi next time

Happy Taxi to Hua Hin. We used the happy taxi company to take us to Hua Hin and then back to Bangkok 6 days later. The taxi arrived on time, was a late model, spotlessly clean car and the driver knew exactly where he was going. The price was comparable to others.

Taxi drivers are helpful. The taxi drivers do not cheat you. I forgot my sons bag but the driver returned it to me. I was amazed at his honesty. Had a wrong impression but it got cleared. Thanks Happy Taxi Dolly

Best way to transfer between Pattaya and Bangkok. No need to say anything too special other than to confirm that the taxi arrived promptly for our pickup from the hotel to the Bangkok airport. The booking process was straightforward and our driver - Toy - spoke good english which was helpful.The one real benefit is that the price was B1300 compared to the hotel rate of B3500 for exactly the same service!

Great service!. We booked a two way transport from bangkok to Hua Hin and the ride were comfortable both ways! My husband left his hp in the car when we go Hua Hin. We called the taxi center and they very fast contacted the driver who then return the hp within half and hour. Thank you and definitely highly recommended Thai Happy Taxi!
good for airport transfers. Our flight was slightly late. The driver was still waiting after over an hour after the time given for us to be picked up

Excellent transfer. Transfer from bangkok to Hua Hin and then return journey for 4200 Baht. Excellent classy cars on both journeys with loads of space and real comfort. Drivers on both journeys were lovely and got water for us etc. Communication by email was very professional including reminders etc. Very very impressed.

Good Service. I used Thai Happy Taxis for round trip airport transfers and a car and driver for a day trip ,I was very happy with there service on time each trip and very comfortable cars and very safe drivers,i will be useing them again next i am in Bangkok
Thai Hosipitality. The quality of taxi is good. The driver is very friendly and happy welcoming tourist in their country.

I was Thai happy... we emailed thai happy taxis months in advance for all our transfers. they gave us a very competitive rate and they emailed us a few days before each journey to check everything was in order. we booked a vip van for my partner two young boys and I. plenty of room and a tv and great aircon.. we were very pleased with our service...

Very good service. We booked Happy Taxi for airport pickup, Pattaya and Bangkok tour. Internet booking was very easy. Booked a sedan and got upgraded to an innova/mazda mini-van. Cars were really clean, good and cool (important in summer). Mr. Kan and Mr.Sid were very good and accommodating. Mr.Sid also suggested places to shop. Only suggestion is for Happy Taxi to have a Pattaya local office if we need a local taxi so taxi charges can be competitive locally. Will recommend to others.

Great People!. I have heard many people commenting about how bad these guys are, and even heard how good they are. But every place in world will have this kind of people, all we need to know is how we treat them. It was my trip to Krabi and I took Happy taxi from Airport to Holiday Inn, and his service and hospitality was really great, I am feeling bad that I am not able to remember his name or Taxi number, but he has in his mid 40's. He got us the best deal for Island tour, gave info about place and even drop us back to airport after our stay, and not even once he demanded extra money. Very great to see his hospitality for quest to his country.

Clean, Well maintained & Good Condition Vehicle. Booked 3 transfers on a MPV with Thai Happy Taxi (from Suvarnabhumi Airport to Pattaya, Pattaya to Bangkok City & Bangkok City to Suvarnabhumi Airport), all trips are comfortable. MPV just right for us, a family of 2 adults and a toddler with 3 luggage (21', 24' & 28') and a collapsible stroller.The drivers are on time for all the trips. The drivers will help carry and load the luggage onto the vehicle. Though the driver don't talk much, they show concern by asking whether the aircon is too hot or too cold.The vehicles are clean, well maintained and in good condition.The rates are stated in their website, but if unsure (like me), email them and they will reply with a day. The rates published are fixed and there is no additional/ hidden charges such as tolls, distant, peak hour charge. I think that the transfers are value for money.Very happy with their service, and we will definitely book with them again the next time we travel to Thailand.

Great transfers. Booked two transfers with Thai Happy Taxi (Bangkok to Pattaya and Pattaya to BKK). Both times it worked great. The drivers were early and waited. The cars were in great condition and comfortable. The rides were pleasant. And the prices are very good for the quality you get (fixed rates on their homepage).
Would definitely use them again.
Floating Market , River Kwai and Tiger Temple. Easy to book , fantastic value for money for an unforgettable day .our driver was friendly and Patient .

Great service. Easy booking. Cheap prices, great cars. Booked taxi from Bangkok to Jomtien. The driver was early and waited until departure. He kept the speed limit and drove nicely. Can recommend Thai happy taxi

Great airport to hotel service. Booking car on line is very easy. Driver was there on arrival at BKK. Just follow directions given in confirming email, to locate driver. Efficient quiet drive to Pattaya hotel, with 5 year old. Clean comfortable car. All inclusive price. Nice way to begin a vacation.

reasonable and direct service. We used Thai happy taxi to get from our downtown Bangkok hotel to a coastal resort. Easy to book, reasonable rates and on time although we had to talk loudly to keep the driver from falling asleep on the return jouney! Otherwise good driving :)

Great Service. Used Thai Happy Taxi to get to Pranburi and then back to the airport. On both legs the driver was early and very happy. Very comfortable ride and service. Communication via email was very efficient and Mr P our driver was an added bonus.

Airport transfers. Used these for return transfers from Bangkok airport into the city. Taxi driver called us while we were coming through customs and was waiting for us once we were through. Car was comfy and airconditioned on both trips. Both drivers were quiet and polite. Would defintely use again.

Mixed feelings. We booked return trip Bangkok - Hua Hin - Bangkok. Both times driver was very early to pick up us from the hotel. First trip car was quite new and there was a sign at the back window "Thai Happy taxi". The driverwas very polite and the ride was very smooth.Trip back to Bangkok was totaly different. First the driver didn't even noticed us at the hotel. He loved to speak so much to his telephone. The hotel bell boy went to tell the driver that we are arrived to the lobby. And the driver only open tailgate and still spoke to the telephone. And the car was old and lowered. After 10 minutes drive driver first time noticed us and say: Sorry. And stop the car next on the road and took another phone from the pocket and start to use that. Totally he spoke first 30 minutes to the phone. The ride was very very uncomfortable because of that old and lowered car. It feels sometimes that you are in the amusement park because car swinging and bouncing so much. Car was also very loud so nothing what Thai Happy Taxi promise at their internet site at the cars are new and comfortable.After these two rides I hope that if somebody book trip from Thai Happy taxi they will get that first driver, that another should go to the phone seller because he love to talk to phone so much.

Recommended and Professional. Booked for airport transfer to pattaya and back. Their communication system over mail very prompt.. Driver very punctual and sharp on time. Charges also very reasonable. Hassle free service. Just a small let down while transfer back from pattaya. The driver for a period of approximately 10-20 mins continuously talking and fighting on phone while driving and also dailing numbers.. Which i felt was risky expecially on motorways when cars run at 120kms/ hr. Overall Professional and Recommended

Cheap uncomfortable ride. Booked airport return service, the pick up was horrible, they arranged a fully modified camry, fitted with large rims and noisy exhaust. The car is lowered which made it very harsh to ride on.

As the name goes, "Happy Taxi". Very prompt response given to enquiries.
Drivers on both trips were very safe drivers and very friendly.
Cars were well-maintained and clean.

Very Reliable and competitive pricing. I used Thai Happy Taxi on my recent visit to Bangkok, and I was pleased with their reliability, car cleanliness and pricing. There is very little else to review on a taxi company but, Thai Happy Taxi, ticks all of the 3 items that I expect when I need to go from point A to B.

Great service. We had a trouble free experience with Thai Happy Taxis. They were able to assist with transportation from the train on arrival and to the airport on departure. We also did a day trip which was in a very comfortable car with Sam the knowledgeable tour guide who made the trip memorable.

Excellent Sevices at economy prices. I have used Thai Taxi couple of times during my stay in Thailand. There customer care is superb and provide prompt replies to queries. Prices are economic and no hidden costs. What they say is what they charge so you can avoid headache of bargaining with local taxi drivers. Cabs are well maintained and on-time. Would highly recommend this to others.

Very good service, cheaper than normal taxi. I cant complain about the service they provide, email your pick up point and get a confimation for that pick up. Pay cash after your dropped off, you can also get the drivers mobile phone number if you want. Helpfull satff, great cars

Excellent !!!. I found this service too good and compare to other taxi services in Thailand it's quite cheap also. Booking online as advance is easy and the rest amount to be paid to the driver by cash. The service is excellent.

Happy customer. fantastic company. I was nervous at booking but with only a small deposit gave it a go. Met by driver at Bangkok airport, he checked it was me and took care of the luggage. Very courteous, will definitely use again. Knew where he was going.

Airport Taxi. I had to travel back to the airport via a taxi and lucky for me on the particular day it was a public holiday so the roads were not crazy busy. Makes me appreciate where I come from-Australia.

Complete waste of time (Day trip). Hi all.Hope this is useful to those who are planning to go on any day trips with any provider.* Need to google on the places before booking any day trips in future; as we had learnt this a hard way through our booking with Happytaxi.I've booked this tour last thursday (11 Jun 2015): http://www.thaihappytaxi.com/WebPage/TourKanchanaburi_MarketBridgeWaterfall.aspxhere's my feedback.It is impossible to complete the tour within the scheduled 9 hours. We spent more time in the mini van than sight-seeing. this tour is a complete waste of time. The driver picked us up at 8am at Centara Grand (Central World; near Siam BTS) and we made our way to the floating market. The journey was more than 1.5 hours. At about 10am, we reached the Damnoen Saduak floating market and started our 1 hour plus boat ride (at around 1015am) through the market. this was enjoyable. (end of boat ride at about 1130am). However, it was very expensive too. 4000 baht for about 1 hour and 15 mins of boat ride through the floating market. I suspect we were brought to a private pier and prices were exhorbitant. The initial price quoted was 5000 baht and we managed to negotiate to 4000 baht.We then wanted to go to the Railway market as listed in the itinerary. However, the driver was not very keen to bring us there; we insisted and he brought us there. We reached the railway market at about 12 and walked around till around 1230pm. We then made our way to Kanchanburi town. We reached the town at almost 315pm! It was almost a 3 hours ride. I didn't expect the town to be so far away. We then spent some time having lunch, looking at River Kwai and the bridge. Didn't have much time to explore as the driver told us that the trip back to Bangkok would take another 3 hours! We then left the town at around 415pm and reached Bangkok at 7pm! We didn't even have time to go to Sai Yok Noi Waterfall (as listed in the itinerary), which according to the driver, is about 50+km away from Kanchanburi town.The tour is a complete disaster. We paid 5500 baht to sit in the van whole day and we wasted one whole day sitting in a van. Total time in van is a horrifying 7 to 8 hours! As a tour planner (Happy Taxi), I didn't expect HappyTaxi to bundle places that are so far apart in 1 single tour and to estimate that the tour would take 9 hours? We wanted to explore and see places and not to sit in the van whole day. The only sightseeing we get is the river boat ride. We spent a total of 9500 baht (~282USD) for this tour and all we get mostly was sitting in a van. I think Happytaxi should stop offering tours that waste tourists' precious time. Most of us have about 1 week at BKK and we wouldn't want to waste 1 whole day sitting in a van. I would rather go to a shopping mall; eat, shop and massage my day away.

Reliable, comfortable, friendly airport to hotel taxi transfer. Reliable, comfortable, friendly airport to hotel taxi transfer ... although a bit expensive at 800baht (normal taxi would have cost about 500 baht max) but hey
nice. i like this taxi its very clean from inside and faster not bad but always the problem every where is the terrific

taxi. If the heat is too much than a metered taxi is best. ALWAYS ASK FOR METERED. Check with your hotel's tour desk, walk around looking for cheaper tour packages before saying yes to a taxi driver and their so called cheap tour packages.

Prompt on Email. I personally didn't use their service during my trip. But while planning for the trip had emailed them for the quotation,etc . I must say they are quite prompt with their responses. Very helpful for tourists visiting first time or arriving at odd hours

Prompt and Efficient. I took thai happy taxi service by booking from their website,they were prompt in replying to every query of mine. I booked them for 3 trips, 1 - pick up from airport to sightseeing of Wat Pho and Grand Palace and drop us back to airport. 2- again pick up from airport to safari world with tickets and drop us to our hotel Novotel siam square. 3- drop us to airport from our hotel. All on different days. I didn't do any price comparison with other taxi,I just trusted them by the good reviews. They were very prompt on time on all occasions. Good driver's behavior. They sent 3 different driver's on each day. Over all they made our travel comfortable. Only one sad thing happened at safari world,even though we arrived early at ticket counters, there was a delay of almost 30 min for the driver to get us the ticket, because of some communication gap between them and not because of long q at counter. This they could have arranged much earlier. My daughter was disappointed since we missed the orangutan show. Driver was very apologetic. Overall nice experience with thai happy taxi,they are trust worthy.

A GOOD EXPERIENCE---TAXI TRANSFER BANGKOK. I have just used( 15th April 2015) Happy Taxi for a transfer from Suvarnabhumi Airport to a cruise ship--BangkokThe cruise was supposed to leave from Laem Chabang but unbeknown to us thecruise line changed the port.Fortunately our driver had the good sense to ask which pier at Laem Chabang-----of course the ship wasn't there--we phoned the agents andfound out the change.Whilst we still had to pay the quoted price---it wasn't their faultI was happy to pay the amount quoted ---Less than half the amount I was quotedat the airport.Good service and the driver was great.

Good Service. I booked it on the net after reviewing a number of other taxi services. They were by far the cheapest. The price is as shown and there are no hidden surprises. The vehicle was as promised and very neat and clean. The driver took us to Pattaya to the hotel and there was no fuss of any kind. He was there to receive us at the Central meeting point of the airport. Make sure you note the telephone nos and take a sim imdtly on reaching and contact them.

Efficient and reliable. Used Happy Taxi a few times. Booked once through website and twice with phone. Both systems worked and they spoke great English. Taxi’s punctual every time and friendly drivers.Once in Bangkok we had a lowered Camry with all the bells and whistles.All round, great service and not bad prices, would definitely use again.

Very prompt reply and good service. Very professional and they reply my email within the same day. They accommodate all my request for a comfortable clean car. The best part is that the driver arrives earlier than scheduled. We booked a car from Bangkok city to Pattaya. driver was very pleasant and very patient even with the traffic jam. I would book with them again the next time.

First rate services. We travelled to Thailand in March/April 2015 and were planning on spending a week in Hua Hin. While we went down on the train (good fun I might add) we didn't want to get the train back. We looked into a few taxi services and we chose Thai Happy Taxi as they reviewed well. We were not disapointed. We booked our taxi a few days before we needed it and it was no issues (we did it online). We recieved both a text and email confirmation of our booking. On the day we were leaving we had a accident and my wife broke her toe. Our plans were up in the air as to when we could leave (or if we could depending on how bad the injury was) so I contacted Thai Happy Taxi to let them know. They were more than accomodating and just said, please let us know when you know. We finished changing our time for them to collect us 2 hours later than we originally booked. We finished up being out of hospital far quicker than expected, were packed and waiting in our room with about 1 and half hours to go before pickup so rung them again to see if they could now come earlier. No problems they said and were there in 10 minutes! Superb.The driver didn't speak a lot of english but enough to get by. They trip was uneventful and he even picked a good road side service station/rest area with loads of food options for us to stop and get lunch.We were so impressed we also booked them to take us from our hotel in Bangkok to the airport. I wouldn't think twice to use their services again. Thank you Thai Happy Taxi

Great service. I was very happy to find Thai Happy Taxi Tours on the internet. When I asked for a price for my trip I got an answer right away, they understood English well and also everything got confirmed within minutes. The driver was on time on the day of my booking, very friendly, the car was a better one than I booked, very comfortable. There was only one thing which I did not like so much, that was that I got the phone number of the driver only late in the evening and my trip was early morning. But the company did sent it as promised and the driver was great.Great job!

Excellent Service. We (my husband & I) availed the service twice from Bangok to Hua Hin and back. Both times the car was very clean and on time. Also the drivers were very polite. Would like to avail their services again and recommend to my friends.

Perfect service. Used the service 3 times when in Thailand and can say anything else: perfect.
On time, correct drivers, clean en nice cars.

excellent service. we booked happy taxi at home a few weeks before, we need to take taxi a few times and for one trip I made a mistake and just saw it one day before, I emailed them and they changed it right away. very friendly driver, especially the driver we had from airport to hua hin, and from hua hin to bkk and than back to airport. but we forgot his name, anymay we would like to thank him because he was really happy taxidriver.

A bit of a disappointment. We took two trips on Happy Taxi. The drivers were late on both occasions. They both showed up and drove us from the airport to hotel then back. The most disconcerting part of this service was the car which was indeed a Toyata Camry which unfortunately looked like a souped up teenager's car. The suspension had been lowered and it looked like it was scraping the road. You could feel every bump on the road which was very uncomfortable in the back seat. Also, since this servicef is not an official taxi, they could not pick us up in front of the airport. Instead we had to drag our bags into the upstairs parking lot where the car was parked.We cancelled the rest of the service and took a metered taxi instead. The car was normal and more comfortable. But the shocker was the fare! It cost 50% less than Happy Taxi to our hotel!!

Best Way to Get Around!!!. I found Thai Happy Taxis in another post and decided to email them to get some prices. WOW fast response and extremely helpful, no questions was to much to answer. I booked via email for the 2 days we were in Thailand and the drivers were on tine (really always early) and were very friendly. Was great knowing we could email the company if we wanted to change our itinerary and any time which we did and it was never a problem. Would definitely recommend them to anyone, had family of 4, 2 young kids, cars were spotless will use them again when we go back.
No problems. Booked Thai Happy Taxis for transfer from airport to hotel,driver waiting on arrival and stress free journey to hotel.Fixed price and no extras ,would use again.

Take the easy route. Found thai happy taxi online when searching for a taxi co. We ended up using them for every major tranfer. Easy inline booking form. They email back super quick and no payment upfront. Pay the driver once you rwach the destination. I would thoroughly recommend using this co.
ease to ride. so easy to take a cab wherever you wanna go and access the whole city, i loved it and it is a good experience. had taken in June, July 2013.

A touch of great human inner beauty. As a frequent visitor to Thailand, I always like to book taxi to and from airport. This time, I randomly picked Thai Happy Taxi. All went fine when driver Sonram from Thai Happy Taxi arrived 15 mins early and pick us up from hotel to the airport till we settled ourselves down comfortably in the airport lounge after immigration. Shocking news came when my friend found his mobile was missing and probably left in the taxi. We all thought even the driver was kind enough not to take the mobile to himself, it's no way to get out again, plus we didn't know the driver at all. While we were depressed as the trip ended in such a sad way, I suddenly received am email from Thai Happy Taxi and asked me to call them ASAP, as Sonram, our driver, had picked our phone up and had been waiting in the airport for us for almost an hour after we got off the taxi! After countless of calls with the Thai Happy taxi to arrange and the great effort of Sonram, we finally got our mobile back after 2.5 hours.I am truly impressed by Sonram's kindliness and his warm heart to return a phone to strangers like us, as well as the taxi company's effort to arrange for us. This experience, to me, is more than getting back the phone, but a touch of great human inner beauty. Here, may I express my hearty thank to Sonram and Thai Happy Taxi tour again and I for sure will recommend this tour to you.

taxi service is inexpensive. I took advantage of this service only once when I ended up in a night shopping area and I decided to opt out of the shopping spree I took a taxi back to my hotel. I found it cheap (for only 100 bhats -about $3.00- I got back to my destination safely and it was night time)

Amazing service, hassle free. Highly recommended. Booked with Thai Happy Taxi from the UK for airport pick from Bangkok airport to your Bangkok hotel, then from the same hotel to Pattaya, then again from Pattaya to a Bangkok hotel.Their service was amazing. The emails that were exchanged didn't have the usual language barrier problems, they understood everything I asked for and the drivers were always early waiting for us. We had different drivers for each trip, and they were all very polite and careful drivers.The prices they quoted is the normal going rate for the journeys requested.We would definitely recommend this company. It was all hassle free and makes such a difference from all the issues we have had previously with different taxi firms.

Great Reliable service and communication. Booked them by Internet from the uk for bangkok to Hua hin return. Quick response, ongoing communication and instructions were excellent, drivers punctual, car was a comfortable Toyota Camry as promised. Would reccomend

So Easy!. We booked Happy Thai Taxi for all kinds of transportation around Thailand. I made an itinerary for 5 days with multiple city stops from Bangkok to Rayong and they were always on time and ready to go. The emails were prompt and easy to understand and they clarifed and reconfirmed almost each ride. The cars were mostly clean and the drivers were courteous. Good value for money and so much easier than any other transportation options. Mostly just get in and go with good planning.We also booked them for a half day "tour" to some temples and the Jim Thompson house. They drove us to each place and gave us mostly adequate time at each place we wished to go. The driver doesn't give any tour info and there is no tour guide unless you add on one which was what was expected. The problems we had were that drivers often didn't know the end destination and would frequently pull over to ask directions, turn around and go in a few circles but we always made it to the destination. The other problem was the half day tour driver asked about going to his "friend's jewelry store" and the "great deals" to be had there. It was annoying but this was only one driver out of the many we had who were much more polite. Be aware of this but overall a good experience. Strange tip but:The cars on the website have huge Happy Thai Taxi logos on them, however the cars are unmarked when they arrive so no worries about screaming you are a tourist upon arrival at each destination.

Average !!! not worth the money paid. i booked 2 times..1 during arrival and another during going back ..during arrival.. the driver was on time waiting at the arrival hall..perfect!..unfortunately we have to wait nearly 30 minutes for him to take the transport ( which we paid for 1000Baht )... then to go to our acccomodation..the driver took us to 2 wrong places until we arrive at the right one and i have to used my handphone ( im on roaming from different countries ) and give to him for him to speak to the owner of the accomodation for an idea to the place..gosh.. the travel took us 2 Hr plus waiting 30minutes when we can arrive approximately 1 hr if only he knew the right direction ( we gave the address way back before we arrive in Bangkok)..so sad ..waste of money i guess..During going back,,it was a different driver..came on time..again another 1000Baht..by right in the communication there shd be a complimentary water bottle..but no they didnt give it to us..again not great experience..The only good thing about this taxi is the customer service..fast, responsive and answer me accurately in email..unfortunately the customer service is very2 good but not the real service (driver)..what a shame :(
good travel advice. I used this company to book some of the tours in Bangkok. People are nice and they provice good service. in general, happy with their service.
Great Service. Drivers were on time, vehicles were smart and clean, quality of driving was good.Drivers were friendly and helpfull

Just OK. I used Thai Happy Taxi once because the company I normally use was not available. Booked online and received quick email response. The driver was a bit late for our trip to the airport and we had to call him to make sure that he was on his way. The car was not the one we booked. The driver was friendly and drove carefully. Even though they are cheaper, I would only use them again if my preferred car company was unavailable.

Happy Taxi car service. I used Happy Taxi car service two times this week. Both booked online and immediate email responses. They were early for both pickups here in Bangkok and in Pattaya. Very good drivers, nice comfortable clean cars and very competitive rates. So just a suggestion- give a Google to Happy Taxi in Bangkok.

good and safe service. I hired a driver + mini bus for my group of 5A + 3C. The driver was friendly and arrived at our hotel on time to pick us up to Damneon Saduak Floating Market. Good and safe driver - the company also provided child seats which were clean and comfy for my 2 toddlers. However, i wasn't happy that the driver dropped us a distance away from the floating market - next to some river channel. We were basically held ransom to pay 6000baht for 2 motor boats which took us on a 1.5h tour. I should have done some sorta research on other alternatives instead of just dropping off at that river channel. As a transport company, i'd give 5 stars. But as a tour company, i'd give 3 stars.

prompt friendly service. .we booked this on line before we arrived in Bangkok. Driver met us at airport. Taxi very clean and modern. Friendly driver pointed out land marks. We decide to cut short our stay in Bangkok and fly to Chiang Mai. emailed happy taxi one hour before pickup they replied immediately and collected us from hotel. Would recommend this taxi service to anyone visiting Bangkok.

Prompt, friendly, efficient. We booked the taxi online for the journey from Bankok to Hua Hin and back again 10 days later. The online service was excellent, confirming our booking a couple of days before we left and again before our return - always very reassuring when you are thousands of miles away! The cars that were used for our trips were modern and in very good condition and we had great journeys in both directions. Whilst not as cheap as a coach service, we felt that we got great value for money and arrived at our hotel (and airport on our return) in great spirits. Not only will we use this service again, we are actively recommending Thai Happy Taxis to friends who are going out to Thailand later in the year.

Good service from Bangkok to Sam Roi Yot. I booked the taxi online and had no problems. The driver was waiting for me at the airport just like promised. The car was good, clean and the driver was friend. He didn't really speak English but that wasn't problem for me. All and all it was very good taxi service! No complaints!

Excellent service above and beyond expectations. We are now back home after our 3 weeks in Thailand and we cannot praise your services enough. This was not our first visit to Thailand but finding Thai Happy Taxi Tours made this visit so much easier.Lots of people can provide taxi services but your standard of service has gone above and beyond the normal and has made our trip so much less stressful than it could have been at every stage. Plenty of clear details about pick up locations etc - right from my initial request for a quote - and friendly reminders and confirmations along the way so that all 3 of our airport and hotel pick ups went like clockwork. Quality vehicles and friendly drivers who were where you said they would be - when you said they would be and who knew exactly where we wanted to go - along with fantastic all inclusive prices which were more than competitive.With the number of tolls involved in and around Thailand the all inclusive price made such a difference, rather than having to keep reaching into our pockets to find the right change for the driver. For us it was just get in the taxi, sit back, relax and get out just where we wanted to be.I cannot praise your service highly enough and would recommend you to anyone looking for standards of service at the highest level and not just a taxi like all the others.Thank you very much.

Booking was fast and easy!. easily booked...called them early in the morning at 8am and requested for a cab at 10am for tranport from Bangkok to Pattaya. confirmation was fast and punctual. thank you!

happy with happy taxi. We used Thai happy taxi to get from Bangkok to Bang-len about 1 1/2 hrs drive away. We were sent a text message about an hour before pick up with the drivers name and phone number The driver arrived at the pick-up at the arranged time in a clean modern car, the driver was friendly and got us to our destination in good time. I would use Thai happy taxi again without hesitation.

Excellent Taxi Service. We found ourselves stuck in a rather obscure part of Bangkok for 4 nights, A family of seven, 4 adults and 3 small children. Six pieces of checked bags and a myriad of carry on. We had a 6:45AM flight out of Bangkok (why did we do that?!?). Anyway, no way to find the two or three taxis at 4:00AM. After checking online I have Thai Happy Taxi a try. I must say they were very prompt in responding to the request. Very reasonable in price and the driver was right on time. Even at 4AM! Driver helped loading up the luggage then safely got us to the airport. Thank you Happy Taxi for soliving our logistic problem!

Taxi in Bangkok. We arranged all our taxi transport with this website, fantastic service in your own limo, its now the second time we used these guys in Bangkok, perfect !! They use all the toll roads so the journey is much quicker

Thai happy taxi the best for customers. HiDuring last 2 weeks I use this taxi company Bangkok to pattaya, pattaya to hua hin and Hua hin to Bangkok airport.Always at time, in airport receive with your name easy to find.Driver speak English and drive with security. car alway clean.And price not so expensive as you can expected.All the team listen to youMany thanks to the staff for traveling without stress.The best confirm your trip before living home

A reliable service. I engaged the help of Thai Happy Taxi Tours to provide transportation from Bangkok Airport to my hotel in Hua Hin (21st Feb), and back (24th Feb). On both occasions, the driver turned up on time and the vehicle used was clean and comfortable. Also, both drivers drove safely and we reached our destination on time. Additionally, I received sufficient level communication before the journeys which provided me with a good degree of comfort; will strongly recommend this service.

Happy with Thai Happy Taxi. After reading some of the unpleasant stories of Bangkok taxis, I decided to book Thai happy taxi for our family trip to Bangkok. I booked their airport transfer, as well as a full day chauffeured service within Bangkok. For airport transfer, I booked their MPV vehicle as I wanted a more comfy ride. It turns out to be the right choice as their vehicle is huge, clean and looks quite new. For the day trip, I booked the Camry instead and the vehicle is just as clean and new.The only gripe is their punctuality for airport transfer. I read from their booking website that it's best to book a timing half hour after flight arrival and I did just that. But the driver was late but just about 10 mins. Same for transfer back to airport. So if you decide to use their service, do buffer some time for lateness. The driver for the day trip was very punctual though. But a little episode kinda tainted the trip. We went to a temple for praying and when we were out to meet the driver, we were petrified to see the bangkok traffic police wheel clamming our vehicle, presumably he had parked illegally while waiting for us. We had to wait for the driver to go to their police office to pay the fine before the vehicle could be released.Other than these, the service is generally good, especially the reservation. As they will send you prompt confirmation and even email reminders. If you could afford it, use their service by all means as they are prompt, reliable and safe. Thank you Thai happy taxi, we are happy customers!

Safe, on time and reliable. Used Thai happy Taxis twice on recent trip. One trip from Hua Hin to Bangkok and also airport transfer.On both occasions they were bang on time and the drivers were very pleasant. Vehicles clean and careful drivers.Like them because you can choose type of car according to the number of passengers and/or amount of luggage. We chose a family mpv for 2 of us as first journey was 3 hours and found it to be very comfortable. It saves a lot of hassle bargaining with taxis on the street and getting a poor service or driver.Very happy with every aspect of our 2 trips and will use again on our next holiday to Thailand.

Good service. They have a few old bad reviews which we read prior to us using their service, we confronted them with the bad reviews which they replied to telling their side of the story. I got the impression that they were a company that continued and learned from their mistakes ( some companies just start over with a new name after a few bad reviews).And YES, our experience is that Thai Happy Taxi is a punctual service minded (also in regards to answering e-mails and phone), smiling, clean and technically equipped (we traveled with our son of 1,5 years and they provided a good child seat. ) - road tolls, child seat and smiles where all included in our journey.Will use them next time we are in Thailand for sure.

Outstanding service. I booked the taxi to collect me from Don Mueang to Pattaya.Firstly, the booking and communication through email was very professional and hassle free always a goods start. The driver was waiting for me as I came through arrivals with a clear sign, I am always a bit worried about the driving in Thailand but I needn't have worried he was great, drove at a safe speed and even stopped and got me a bottle of water which was a nice touch.I was so impressed with the service I booked them for the return journey, again very good.Cannot fault at all would highly recommend.

Excelent for private transfers. When I was going to book online taxi from bkk to pattaya I emailed to multiple taxi service companies. some of them answered hours ago, some day ago. but Happy Taxi answered very first just in a few minutes after request. I ordered card with babyseat but they provided car without babyseat. It was the only problem with them. Overall I liked the transfer and then I boocked transfer from pattaya to koh-kood boat and back and also one more transfer from pattaya to bkk. They gave me some discount on bulk booking. Driver was friendly and helpfull and very precious on time. no delays. comfortable car and did as many stops as we needed. We realy satisfied by their service. Special thanks to mr. Kan, the driver, who made all our trips very comfortable. Next time I will certainly choose Happy Taxi service.

Friendly and Fast. Took a taxi from Pattaya to Bangkok with my friends. The taxi showed up on time and loaded all our bags for us. They even stopped along the highway so we could eat and shop. All of our tolls were included as well. (many taxi companies make you pay tolls which I found out later). I will be using them when I return to Thailand in the future. I recommend them.

Airport - Hua Hin transfer. Booked via the website for a 3 hour return transfer last week. Was a little nervous about it but didn't need to be, their service and communication beforehand was great and their prices are the best I found and all published on the website. Would definitely recommend and use again.

I feel safe with them. I live here and spent some time online looking for a company that sounded reliable. We tried The happy taxi and were really pleased with the service. It's not more expensive than others. I think in Bangkok you will pay the same or more for the same service. We have done just Bkk-Pattaya and Bkk Airport but intend to use them every time from now on, also for private tours. The best think is that you can book online, they reply quickly and in English: you know what you are getting and how much it's going to cost you. The drivers were on time every single time. Coming from the airport into town I've always used the public taxi service and it's been OK. And depending on where you are going, do not hesitate to use the Airport link: it's a fantastic service.

Taxi to Pattaya . This company offered excellent service. They supplied a nice 9 pass van for 6 of us and a lot of luggage. We booked in oct an payed 2200baht from Bangkok to Pattaya. They stopped for us to eat and all tolls are included.

PUCTUAL TAXI SERVICE. I used Thaihappy taxi for my pick-up at Suvarnabhumi very early in the morning. driver was waiting for me and braught me safely to my Bangkok hoteL a few days later i ordered a pick-up to take me to Hua Hin . driver punctual on time, very friendly and helpfull. e-mail contact with Thaihappy taxi also very friendly and lightning fast. very pleased with their services and their competitive rates. alreaddy ordered my pick-up in Hua Hin for transport to Suvarnabhumi . i am a hayy customer of happy taxi !

Great transport to and from BKK to hotel. My husband and I were visiting Bangkok and arranged for this transportation service from the airport to our hotel. Our driver who was also the owner of the service was so nice to us and so helpful with advice on our first trip to Bangkok.
